loans.name: Rose-Marie

texts.fr: Rose Marie est âgée de 38 ans. Elle vit en union libre et a cinq enfants. Ces derniers son tous scolarisés. Rose Marie trouve pas mal de difficultés à prendre soin de sa famille, faute de revenus suffisants.  Elle a mis sur pied un petit commerce de revente de clairin et liqueur. Mais son petit stock ne lui permet pas générer plus de revenus. Elle a demandé un prêt pour augmenter son stock.
texts.en:
Rose Marie is 38 years old. She lives in a civil partnership and has 5 children who all attend school.

Rose Marie finds it hard to take care of her family because of a lack of income. She has started a small business selling Clairin (a strong spirit, similar to rum, made from cane sugar) and liquor. However, her small inventory does not allow her to generate more income. She has requested a loan in order to increase her inventory.

loans.use: to buy gallons of Clairin.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 48 years old and widowed with four children; three children are still in school, Ruth works very hard to provide for them.

Ruth runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, bread, snack foods. and other personal care products. Ruth has been in this business for four years.

In the future Ruth would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, bread, snack foods, and other personal care products.

loans.name: Chona

texts.en:
Chona is 44 years old and married with two children; one child in school. Chona works very hard to provide for them.

Chona runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, junk food, home care products, and other groceries. Chona has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Chona would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, junk food, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Marites works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from retail clothing and frozen food businesses. Marites is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF in order to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell for her general store business.

Marites has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF and, more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma works hard to support her family. Vilma is widow and has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks of vegetables to sell. Vilma has been in this business for seven years now. She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

In the future, Vilma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Marjorie

texts.en:
Marjorie is a married woman with three children, all of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Marjorie is 35 years old.

Marjorie has a fruit vending business in the Philippines. Marjorie requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy a variety of fruit to sell.

Marjorie has been in this business for five years. In the future, Marjorie would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fruit to sell.

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es: Roberto es un hombre trabajador que a sus 35 años de edad se dedica al cultivo de la tierra actividad que aprendió desde muy pequeño, pero además en sus tiempos libres presta sus servicios de electricista, lo que le permite obtener mejores ingresos económicos. Roberto vive con su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos de 12 y 6 años de edad en vivienda propia la cual logro adquirir hace 10 años con mucho esfuerzo. Roberto desea invertir en insumos agrícolas para mejorar sus cultivos y en herramientas para prestar un mejor servicio de electricista, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: fertilizantes, abono y herramientas de electricista y de esta manera mejorar sus cultivos y servicios.
texts.en:
Roberto is a hardworking, 35-year-old man who makes a living cultivating the land, an occupation he learned when he was very young. In his free time he also works as an electrician, which allows him to improve his income. Roberto lives with his life partner and his two children, ages 12 and 6, in their own house, which he managed to buy ten years ago with a lot of effort.

Roberto wants to invest in farming supplies to improve his crops and in tools to offer better services as an electrician. For these reasons, he is requesting a loan through FUSAI to invest in fertilizer and manure and in electrician's tools.

loans.use: to invest in fertilizer and manure and in electrician's tools so that he can improve his crops and his services.

loans.name: Virgen Asunta Oyara Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN ASUNTA OYARA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Vilcabamba, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

El socio Cipriano tiene 67 años de edad tiene 03 hijos y es casado, el socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al cultivo de frutas como platanos, naranjas entre otros para todos sus clientes que le solicitan, él socio lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio  solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, abono entre otros.
Los socios agradecen  a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se comprometen  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
The borrowers belong to the Virgen Asunta Oyara communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Vilcabamba, which is part of La Convención province and Cusco department.

The borrower Cipriano is 67 years old, has 3 children, and is married. The borrower alternates his daily tasks with working growing fruits such as plantains, oranges, and others for all the customers who ask for them. The borrower has been in this business for a good while, which is going well for him thanks to the determination that he puts into his business each day. The borrower wants to be able to continue working so that, in this way, to continue supporting his family.

The borrower asks for the loan to purchase seeds, manure, and more.

The members are grateful to those who form part of this dream through this platform and promise to make their payments on the established schedule.

The borrowers who are in the attached photo asked for permission to arrive late to the meeting due to work reasons.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, manure, and more.

loans.name: Los Amigos Del Norte Group

texts.es:
Marina continúa con su negocio de venta de comida tradicional(sentada al centro, viste blusa blanca y lleva una cartera rosa). El crédito que obtuvo lo utilizó en la construcción de un techo para su puesto de comida, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque tuvo buenas ventas. Actualmente la banca sigue reunida con el fin de mejorar sus negocios, “ahora puedo recibir más clientes y vender más comida…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con nuevos clientes, la desventaja es la falta de insumos de cocina como, aceite, arroz, fideo, carne, yuca y otros para cocinar. Su sueño es consolidar su negocio, ella desea comprar insumos de cocina por mayor para cocinar a diario. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Marina solicita un préstamo comprar insumos de cocina para cocinar a sus nuevos clientes.
texts.en:
Marina continues with her business selling traditional food (she is seated in the middle, wearing a white blouse and has a pink bag). The loan that she got, she used to build a roof for her food stand, her payments were punctual because she had good sales. Currently, the bank continues meeting with the end of improving their businesses. "Now I can serve more customers and sell more food..." she says. The advantage of her business is that she has new customers, the disadvantage is the lack of cooking supplies such as oil, rice, noodles, meat, yucca, and more to cook. Her dream is to strengthen her business. She wants to purchase cooking supplies in bulk to cook daily. This is her second loan cycle with the institution in the 3 years that she has been doing this work.

It is for these reasons that Marina asks for a loan to purchase cooking supplies to cook for her new customers.

loans.use: to purchase cooking supplies such as oil, rice, noodles, meat, yucca, and more, in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid.

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru: Это женщина Дилбар. Она 42 летняя жительница. Дилбар из района Вахш. Она замужем и мать двоих детей. Детям 14 и 9 лет. Дети учатся в средней школе. Ее муж работает сварщиком и ремонтом арба. Сама Дилбар занимается торговлей арба. Дилбар покупает металлические листы для изготовления арбы путем сварки. Ее муж изготавливает арба путем сварки. После изготовления арба Дилбар продает их на рынке. Дилбару не хватает металлические листы для изготовления арба. И у нее не хватает денег для приобретения необходимые средства. Дилбар из-за нехватки денег обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en:
This woman is named Dilbar. She is 42 and from the Vakhsh region. She is married with two children aged 14 and 9, both of whom are in school. Her husband works as a welder and makes wheeled trailers. Dilbar handles the sales portion of the business - she buys the sheets of metal so her husband can make the trailers and then she sells the finished trailers at the market.

Silbar doesn't have enough sheets of metal to make more trailers, nor does she have enough money to buy them. For this reason she is looking for a loan.

loans.use: to buy sheets of metal

loans.name: David Mauricio

texts.es: David tiene 18 años de edad está soltero vive con sus papas, cuando tenía 12  años  su abuela le regalo dos cerdos uno  de plástico en  forma de alcancía y otro para que lo alimentara, cuidara, con el tiempo lo vendiera y ahorrara el dinero en la alcancía, desde ese entonces transformo esta idea positiva en un pequeño negocio, David compra chanchos pequeños los cuida y alimenta luego de un tiempo los vende obteniendo dinero para ayudar a sus padres a pagar el alquiler de la vivienda ,el necesita el dinero para poder comprar tres cerdos, alimento, vitaminas, incrementaría  sus ventas  aportando a los gastos del hogar.
texts.en: 18-year-old David is single and lives with his parents. When he was 12, his grandma gave him two pigs. One was a piggy bank made of plastic and the other one he had to feed and look after so that, in time, he could sell it and save the money in his piggy bank. He has since developed that positive idea into a small business. He buys piglets, looks after them and feeds them and the, some time later, he sells them to raise money to help his parents pay the rent. He needs the money to buy three pigs, pig feed and vitamins so that he can increase his sales and contribute to the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy three pigs, pig feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Tania Graciela

texts.es: Tania es una mujer que a sus 32 años de edad muestra su tenacidad, en el cuido y mejora de su granja de pollos, la cual instalo en su vivienda hace 5 años, y es gracias a ello que logra sacar adelante a su familia. Tania vive en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 5 años de edad al que siempre busca la manera de brindar lo mejor. Tania desea continuar mejorando su negocio, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: pollos y gallinas y de esta manera obtener mejores ingresos económicos, ya que con el crédito anterior logro invertir en más pollo y también amplio el espacio de la granja.
texts.en: Tania is a 32 year old woman who, at her age,  shows her tenacity in rearing and caring for her chicken farm. She installed the farm at her house five years ago and, thanks to it,  she has been able to get her family ahead. Tania lives in her own house with her life partner and their 5 year old son, to whom she always wants to give the best. Tania wishes to continue improving her business, thus she is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in chickens and hens and, in this way,  obtain better economic earnings. With her last loan, she was able to buy more chickens and to expand the space for her farm.

loans.use: invest in chickens and hens and, in this way,  obtain better economic earnings.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To invest in tins, flour, sugar, lard and other ingredients.

loans.name: Marco Vinicio

texts.es: Marco tiene 19 años de edad, de estado civil soltero, vive con sus padres y  hermanos a los que apoya económicamente para que sigan estudiando Marlon de 16, Talía de 13 años de edad,  tuvo que viajar lejos de su hogar cuando tenía 15 años a buscar trabajo en una plantación de rosas tratando de ahorrar dinero, hace 8 meses atrás regreso para  dedicarse  a hacer ladrillo en una pequeña tejería. Marco necesita el dinero para comprar una maquina mezcladora de tierra facilitando  más rápidamente  la fabricación de  los mismos, incrementaría sus ventas generando más ingresos ayudando a sus hermanos a seguir estudiando para que ellos no tengan que alejarse de su hogar  a tan temprana edad.
texts.en: 19-year-old Marco is single and lives with his parents and siblings, Marlon (aged 16) and Talia (aged 13). Marco's income helps to enable them to continue their education. When he was 15, he had to leave home and travel some distance away to find work on a rose plantation. In an attempt to save money, he moved back home 8 months ago and started producing bricks in a small mill. Marco needs the money to buy an earth mixing machine which will make the task of making bricks easier and will enable him to boost his sales. He will then be able to use this additional income to help his siblings continue their education so they do not have to leave home at such an early age.

loans.use: to buy an earth mixing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first local solar-powered microgrid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first local solar-powered microgrid.

loans.name: Juan Arnoldo

texts.es: Juan es un hombre trabajador que a sus 31 años de edad se dedica a la elaboración de estructuras metálicas, lo que le ha permitido durante 10 años sacar adelante a su familia. Juan habita en casa propia pero humilde junto a su hija de 9 años de edad a la que logra sacar adelante con mucho esfuerzo. Juan desea mejorar su lugar de trabajo y adquirir más herramientas que le permitan brindar un mejor servicio, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: tenazas, electrodos, llaves, lámina galvanizada, polines y pines para mejorar su lugar de trabajo y herramientas para su trabajo.
texts.en: 31-year-old Juan is a hardworking man who builds metal structures. His business has enabled him to support his family for the last 10 years. He lives in his own modest home with his 9-year-old daughter, putting all his efforts into looking after her. Juan would like to improve his workshop and buy more tools so he can serve his customers better. Therefore, he is applying to FUSAI for a loan to buy pliers, electrodes, spanners, galvanised sheeting, wooden poles and pins to improve his workshop, and also some tools for his work.

loans.use: to buy pliers, electrodes, spanners, galvanised sheeting, wooden poles and pins to improve his workshop, and also some tools for his work.

loans.name: Pablo Alberto

texts.es: Pablo tiene 30 años de edad, de estado civil soltero, vive con su madre,quien depende de el, posee una pequeña tienda, nos comenta que la venta de productos le deja una cantidad minima de ganancias para mantener supequeño hogar,solicita el credito para comprar mas productos y llenar su tienda, asi ganara mas clientes y sus ganancias aumentaran.
texts.en: Pablo is 30 years old and single. He lives with his mother, who is dependent on him, and has a small store. He tells us that the sale of products leaves him with a minimum amount of income to maintain his small home. He is asking for the loan to buy more products and to fill his store. In this way he will gain more customers and his earnings will increase.

loans.use: to increase the products in his store

loans.name: Deisy Patricia

texts.es: Deisy de 34 años, es una ama de casa residenciada en Cartagena de Indias en compañía de su cónyuge e hijos, esta polifacética mujer ejerce varios roles; cónyuge, madre y empresaria independiente sin descuidar ninguna de sus responsabilidades.  Cuando apenas era una estudiante de colegio, recibió una publicidad de una academia de belleza ofertando cursos e inmediatamente se inscribió, al cumplir su mayoría de edad empezó a ejercer en distintos salones de la ciudad, años más tarde se independizó por las ventajas que tenía: manejo de su tiempo, incremento de sus ingresos y una amplia base de clientes. Alterno a su actividad principal, comercializa calzado a sus clientes; aprovecha los domicilios cuando es contratada para los servicios de manejo de la imagen y les exhibe el calzado.  Todos los días de la semana está disponible a partir de la 1 pm hasta las 5 p.m., en la actualidad está aplicando a una solicitud de crédito, su primer credikiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para comprar nuevo surtido de calzado e insumos de peluquería, inversión que le permitirá ser mucho más competitiva en la temporada decembrina. Sus metas a futuro son: terminar la construcción de su vivienda, adecuar un salón de belleza en ella y tener éxito.
texts.en: Deisy is 34 years old. She is a housewife living in Cartagena de Indias with her common law husband and children. This eclectic woman handles different roles: wife, mother and independent business woman without neglecting either responsibility. When she was a high school student, she saw an ad from a beauty school offering courses and she registered immediately. When she became an adult, she began to work in different beauty salons, years later she started her own business because of the advantages of managing her own time, increase earnings, and acquire a wide range of clients. In addition to this main business, she sells footwear to her clients. She takes advantage of her beauty home appointments where she is hired to improve her clients' images, and she shows them her footwear. She is available from 1:00-5:00 p.m. She is currently applying for a loan, her first credikiva from the Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo to buy a new assortment of footwear and beauty salon supplies, which will allow her to be more competitive during the December season.

loans.use: buy a new assortment of footwear and beauty salon supplies.

loans.name: Maria Flor

texts.es: María de 55 años de edad es una mujer emprendedora que se dedica a la venta de productos helados y congelados de frutas naturales como: charamuscas, gelatinas, paletas, entre otros, además cuenta con una mini tienda de productos básicos. María logro con mucho esfuerzo comprar su casa propia hace 20 años, lo que le brinda tranquilidad, ya que tiene un lugar propio en el cual habitar y donde tiene su negocio. María desea invertir en su mini tienda, ya que carece de algunos granos básicos y otros productos que sus clientes solicitan, por lo que buscando la manera de mantener la clientela, solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cereales, granos básicos, bebidas frías, lácteos, entre otros productos solicitados.
texts.en:
María is 55 years old and is an enterprising woman who makes a living by selling ice cream and frozen natural fruit products like flavored ices, gelatins, and popsicles. She also has a small store of staple products. With a lot of effort, María was able to buy her own house twenty years ago. This has provided her with tranquility, as she has her own space to live in and where she has her business.

María wants to invest in her small store, as she is lacking some basic grains and other products that her customers request. She is therefore looking for a way to keep her customers. She is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in cereals, basic grains, cold drinks, and dairy products, among other products requested.

loans.use: to invest in cereals, basic grains, cold drinks, and dairy products, among other products requested.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es: María tiene 50 años de edad, es de estado civil divorciada, vive con su hija que tiene discapacidad, ella se dedica a la venta de joyas, esto le permite obtener escasas ganancias para los gastos de su hija y de su hogar, solicita de este crédito para la compra de más joyas, así podrá vender más y sus ganancias aumentaran.
texts.en: 50-year-old María is divorced and lives with her disabled daughter. She sells jewellery for a living and this enables her to earn a small income with which to look after her daughter and cover her household expenses. She is seeking this loan to buy more jewellery so that she can sell more and boost her income.

loans.use: to buy and sell jewellery

loans.name: Henry Jeovanny

texts.es: Henry es un joven que desde muy joven aprendió a ganarse la vida, por lo que a sus 28 años de edad él tiene un hijo de 9 años de edad al que apoya mucho, para que no le falte nada, ya que aunque no vive con el siempre está pendiente. Henry se dedica a prestar sus servicios de ayudante de mecánico, desde hace 12 años, ya que por la precaria economía de su familia, aprendió el oficio desde muy pequeño, lo cual no desea para su hijo, ya que le apoya para que estudie. Henry desea construirla base de cemento de su vivienda, ya que en esta época de mucha lluvia, la lámina no logra detener el agua que se filtra en el piso, que es de tierra, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir la base de cemento de su vivienda y de esta manera tener mejores condiciones de su hogar.
texts.en: Henry is a young man who learned how to earn his own living from a very young age. At 28, he has a nine-year-old son who he supports, so that he does not lack for anything, and even though he does not live with him he is always in touch with him. For twelve years Henry has worked as a mechanic's assistant, he learned this work from a very young age because of his family's precarious finances; he does not want this for his son, so he provides support for him to attend school. Henry would like to build a cement foundation for his house, since in the rainy season, the corrugated metal does not keep water from seeping into the dirt floor. He is applying for a FUSAI loan to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and steel to build a cement foundation and improve the conditions of his home.

loans.use: to buy sand, gravel, bricks and steel to build the cement foundation of his house, and in this way improve the condition of his home.

loans.name: Monica Del Carmen

texts.es: Mónica es una mujer trabajadora que a sus 22 años de edad lucha por salir adelante apoyada en su negocio de venta de ropa, actividad que realiza desde hace varios años. Ella vive solo con su pequeño hijo de 6 años de edad, pero ser madre soltera no le ha impedido salir adelante y brindar lo mejor a su hijo que se encuentra estudiando. Mónica desea invertir en su negocio, ya que se acerca la mejor temporada para su negocio, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: pantalones, blusas, faldas, vestidos, entre otros productos muy solicitados por su clientela.
texts.en: 22-year-old Mónica is a hardworking woman. She manages to get by thanks to her clothing business, which she has been running for a number of years. She lives alone with her 6-year-old son, but being a single mother has not stopped her from getting on and enabling her son to have an education. Mónica wants to invest in her business because her business' most profitable time is approaching. Therefore, she is applying for a FUSAI loan to buy trousers, blouses, skirts, dresses, and otheritems for which there is a great demand from her customers.

loans.use: to buy trousers, blouses, skirts, dresses and other items for which there is a great demand from her customers.

loans.name: Jose Agustin

texts.es: José es un hombre trabajador que a sus 74 años de edad siempre pone todo su empeño para salir adelante, es por ello que desde hace 18 años presta sus servicios de jardinero en diferentes residenciales de la capital, pero además desde muy joven aprendió a cultivar la tierra por lo que siempre siembra maíz y frijol, el cual vende obteniendo mejores ingresos económicos. José construyo su vivienda desde hace 16 años, la cual es muy humilde pero acogedora. Él desea invertir en insumos agrícolas para sus cultivos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: fertilizantes, abono y semillas para cultivar frijol y maíz obteniendo mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
José is a hard-working 74-year-old man who has always put forth his best effort to get ahead. This is why he has worked as a gardener at different residences in the capital for the past 18 years.

But in addition, since he was very young he learned to cultivate the land and has always grown corn and beans for additional income from their sale. Jose built his house 16 years ago, which is very humble but cozy.

Jose wants to invest in farming supplies for his crops so he is requesting a loan from FUSAI so he can buy fertilizers, manure, and seeds to grow beans and corn, increasing his income.

loans.use: to invest in fertilizers, manure, and seeds for his bean and corn crops.

loans.name: Lazaro Trinidad

texts.es:
Santo Domingo es una ciudad muy comercial y productiva; caracterizada por contar con un buen clima y ser una zona muy visitada por turistas ya que en ella habita la étnica Tsáchila. En esta ciudad vive Lázaro un señor muy trabajador, habita en un recinto del cantón, vive en casa propia con dos hijos quienes aún están cursando la secundaria.
Lázaro trabaja todos los días, cuenta con producción de chanchos hace varios años; se levanta desde muy temprano a alimentar a los animales y por las tardes limpia las chancheras; también en sus tiempos libres se dedica a trabajar en jornales en finca aledañas. Gracias a este negocio él ha podido sacar a sus hijos adelante, darles la educación y un techo en donde vivir.
Lázaro con este crédito podrá mejorar las chanceras, adecuarlas mejor y comprar más animales y balanceado para seguir fortaleciendo su negocio y poder seguir contando con esta fuente de ingresos. Él quiere que sus hijos sean unos profesionales y por eso está trabajando arduamente para apoyarles en sus estudios y agradece a KIVA por esta oportunidad de cumplir sus anhelos.
texts.en: Santo Domingo is a very productive and commercial city, known for its good climate and for being a tourist attraction,  where the ethic group Tsachila resides. Lasaro lives in this city, he is a hard working man who lives in his own house in this district, with his two children who attend high school. For the past several years, Lasaro has worked everyday raising pigs. He wakes up very early to feed the animals and cleans the pig pens in the afternoons. In his spare time, he works as a laborer in the neighboring farms. Thanks to this business, he has been able to raise his children, and to give them an education and  a place to live. With this loan, Lasaro will be able to improve the pig farm, to better adapt the pig pens,  and to buy more animals and food to continue strengthening his business and keep this source of income. He wants his kids to become professionals and thus he is working hard to support them in their studies. He thanks KIVA for thi opportunity to see his dreams come true.

loans.use: To improve and adapt his hog farm, so that he can increase the number of pigs and with these earnings help his children get ahead.

loans.name: Maria Eulalia

texts.es: María es una mujer trabajadora que a sus 46 años de edad se dedica a la elaboración y venta de chocolate artesanal para cocer, actividad que realiza desde hace 15 años, por lo que logra salir adelante. Ella  vive en casa de su propiedad junto a su madre que es de avanzada edad, a la que apoya y siempre trata de brindar lo mejor. María desea invertir en los ingredientes para la elaboración de su producto, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: azúcar, cacao, canela entre otros los cuales comprara por mayor para mejorar sus ganancias y seguir apoyando a su madre.
texts.en: 46-year-old María is a hardworking woman who sells her own hand-made cooking chocolate. She has been running her business for 15 years and her income enables her to get by. She lives in her own home along with her elderly mother, who she supports and always tries to do her best for. María would like to buy ingredients for making her product and so she is applying to FUSAI for a loan to buy goods such as sugar, cocoa and cinnamon in bulk so she can boost her income and continue supporting her mother.

loans.use: to buy goods such as sugar, cocoa and cinnamon in bulk so she can boost her income and continue supporting her mother.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
La socia María se dedica a cuidar ancianos, ya que ella ha sido durante años auxiliar en fisioterapia, esta labor es de mucha responsabilidad.
María  tiene 49 años y también se dedica  a su tienda de abarrotes , un pequeño negocio que le ayuda a tener mas ingresos  con el fin de seguir educando a su hijo,  la socia necesita el dinero para comprar un mostrador, galletas, gaseosa, arroz, azúcar y aceite.
Ella pertenece al banco tres de mayo de Poroy, está satisfecha con la oportunidad que tiene ahora con el préstamo por que con este capital continuara con su negocio propio, la socia agradece y esta feliz del préstamo que se le otorga y se  compromete a pagar puntualmente sus pagos acordados.
texts.en:
María makes a living by caring for the elderly, as she has been a physical therapy aid for many years. This work is a lot of responsibility. María is 49 years old and also makes a living with her grocery store, a small business that helps her to have more income in order to keep educating her son. She needs the money to buy a display case, crackers, soda, rice, sugar and oil. 

María belongs to the "Tres de Mayo de Poroy" communal bank. She is satisfied with the opportunity she now has with the loan, because she will continue with her own business with this loan. She is grateful for and happy about the loan granted to her and promises to make her agreed-upon payments in a punctual manner.

loans.use: to buy a display case, crackers, soda, rice, sugar and oil

loans.name: Guadalupe Laureana

texts.es:
Guadalupe se dedica a la venta de desayunos en la calle. Esta actividad requiere mucho sacrificio, ya que se levanta muy temprano para preparar sus distintos desayunos, preparar sus panes y parte a su trabajo en la madrugada. Ella tiene 42 años y requiere el préstamo para comprar  ollas, quinua, maca y panes. Su actividad es difícil pero rentable ya que ella tiene sus clientes que la conocen y confían en ella. su deseo es sacar adelante a sus tres hijos los cuales dependen de ella y su pequeño negocio de desayunos.
la socia se compromete cumplir sus obligaciones como acreedora y agradece a los prestatarios , ya que para ella significa mucho este apoyo que tanto necesitaba.
texts.en: Guadalupe sells food in the street. This work requires a great deal of sacrifice, since she gets up very early to make her special breakfast dishes, she makes her bread and does some of her preparation in the early morning. She is 42 and needs the loan to buy pots, quinoa, maca (a traditional Peruvian food), and breads. Her business is difficult but viable, since she has loyal customers who know and trust her. She would like to support her three children who depend on her and her little breakfast business. She is committed to meeting the loan requirements and is grateful to the lenders, since this much-needed support means a great deal to her.

loans.use: to buy pots, quinoa, maca (a traditional Peruvian food), and bread.

loans.name: Reel

texts.en:
This loan helps Reel get connected to his local prepay microgrid.

Reel is a 77-year-old father of 7. He is a farmer and lives in a small white and brown wooden house in Les Anglais, in southern Haiti. He is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to be able to connect to the local solar-powered microgrid, and to finally get rid of his dirty, costly kerosene lamp. Mainly, he is looking forward to being connected as it will allow him to save money - Reel and his family will now be able to benefit from a reliable, durable, and clean power source.

After running pilots since 2012 that proved the benefits of prepay quality electricity to people in Les Anglais (first with 14 households, and up to 54), EarthSpark International is developing a full-scale, solar-powered microgrid. This micro-grid is expected to meet the needs of up to 500 households. Kiva loans allow EarthSpark to increase the number of beneficiaries by reducing the up-front costs for customers, and will be repaid over time by electricity sales.

To see a video of Les Anglais and the hybrid solar grid, please click here."

loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid

loans.name: Ketler

texts.en:
This loan helps Ketler get connected to his local prepay microgrid.

Ketler is a 60-year-old father of 5, with 2 going to school. He is a farmer and lives in a small white and brown wooden house in Les Anglais, in southern Haiti. He is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to be able to connect to the local solar-powered microgrid and to have his business finally independent of his noisy, costly, small diesel generator.

After running pilots since 2012 that proved the benefits of prepay quality electricity to people in Les Anglais (first with 14 households, and up to 54), EarthSpark International is developing a full-scale, solar-powered microgrid. This micro-grid is expected to meet the needs of up to 500 households. Kiva loans allow EarthSpark to increase the number of beneficiaries by reducing the up-front costs for customers, and will be repaid over time by electricity sales.

To see a video of Les Anglais and the hybrid solar grid, please click here."

loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
Elena  es una mujer luchadora que saca adelante a su familia , ella sigue en el negocio de la venta de chicha blanca y ropa. Esta actividad le permite sacar adelante a su familia  y sabe que según las temporadas climáticas tiene que variar y ofrecer muchos más productos y dar mas opciones a sus clientes.
Ella necesita el capital para comprara medias,gorros y chalinas, ya que se acerca las épocas de lluvias en el Cusco y estos productos son de temporada
.la clienta está muy contenta que Kiva le haya hecho el préstamo pues así ella tendrá más oportunidades de surgir y seguir con sus dos pequeños negocios que sustentan a su familia
texts.en:
Elena is a determined woman who supports her family by continuing to run her business selling chichi blanca (a corn drink) and clothing. She knows that she has to vary the goods she sells, offering her customers a wider choice. She needs the capital to buy tights, caps and scarves as it will soon be rainy season in Cusco and these are the things that people need at this time of year. Elena is very grateful to Kiva for the loan as it will improve her chances of
making progress and continuing to run the two small businesses which support her family.

loans.use: to buy tights, caps and scarves.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia  es una humilde pobladora de Poroy , ella expende en el mercado verduras , este negocio le permite subsistir y mantener los gastos familiares.
la socia tiene 34 años y cuatro hijos los cuales dependen de ella , Ella necesita el préstamo para comprar zanahoria, tomate, pimiento y cebolla. ya que quiere seguir luchando por sus sueños que es sacar adelante a sus hijos dándoles una buena educación, ella también se dedica a ser cobradora en empresas de trasporte urbano.
la socia pertenece ala banco "tres de mayo de Poroy" ubicado en la provincia del Cusco. ella agradece a los inversionista de KIVA por darle el crédito y se compromete a cumplir sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Antonia is a humble resident of Poroy. She sells in the vegetable market. This business allows her to subsist and to cover her family's expenses. She is 34 years old and has four children who depend on her. She needs the loan to buy carrots, tomatoes, peppers and onions, since she wants to keep striving to achieve her dream of getting her children ahead, giving them a good education. She also makes a living as a fare collector for urban transport companies. 

Antonia belongs to the "Tres de Mayo de Poroy" communal bank located in the province of Cusco. She is grateful to the Kiva investors for giving her the loan and promises to make her payments in a punctual manner.

loans.use: to buy carrots, tomatoes, peppers and onions

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first local solar-powered microgrid.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid

loans.name: Julio Manuel

texts.es: Julio es un comerciante destacado en un sector del municipio de Cartagena que durante quince años ha estado percibiendo ingresos a raíz de esta actividad, y solventado a su familia con la venta de electrodomésticos. Durante el trayecto de su carrera ha logrado comercializar diferentes tipos de productos entre ellos queso y suero, y aunque actualmente vende exclusivamente electrodomésticos, su capital lo generó con el comercio de otros productos. Julio cuenta con 15 años de experiencia en el ámbito y requiere renovar el surtido de electrodomésticos, para ello está aplicando a una solicitud de crédito, su primer credikiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para comprar televisores, hornos microondas, sanducheras y demás electrodomésticos que considere que son de alto requerimiento por sus clientes.  Con esta inversión podrá aprovechar la temporada en la que sus clientes reciben primas salariales y deciden comprar estos productos.  Su meta a futuro es tener una distribuidora a nivel de toda la costa y terminar de construir su vivienda.
texts.en: Julio is a leading salesman in a sector of the municipality of Cartagena. For fifteen years he has earned income through this work, and supported his family by selling household appliances. Over the course of his career he has managed to sell different kinds of products, including cheese and whey, and although now he sells household appliances exclusively, he earned his capital by selling other products. Julio has fifteen years of experience in the field and needs to replenish his stock of appliances, so he is applying for a loan, his first through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, to buy televisions, microwaves, electric sandwich makers and other appliances, to take advantage of the season when his customers receive their annual bonuses and decide to buy these products. His goal for the future is to have distribution along the entire coast and to finish building his house.

loans.use: to purchase televisions, microwaves, electric sandwich makers and other appliances that his customers need.

loans.name: Paul Henri

texts.en:
This loan helps Paul Henri get connected to his local prepay microgrid.

Paul Henri runs a small business and lives in a small brown and pink house in Les Anglais, in southern Haiti. He is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to be able to connect to the local solar-powered microgrid, and to finally get rid of his dirty, costly kerosene lamp. Mainly, he is looking forward to being connected as it will allow him to save money. Paul Henri and his family will now be able to benefit from a reliable, durable, and clean power source.

After running pilots, since 2012, that proved the benefits of prepay quality electricity to people in Les Anglais (first with 14 households, and up to 54), EarthSpark International is developing a full-scale, solar-powered microgrid. This micro-grid is expected to meet the needs of up to 500 households. Kiva loans allow EarthSpark to increase the number of beneficiaries by reducing the up-front costs for customers, and will be repaid over time by electricity sales.

To see a video of Les Anglais and the hybrid solar grid, please click the link below.

loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid

loans.name: Purity

texts.en:
Purity is an energetic and beautiful young 27 year old woman. Born in Nkuene, a rural village in Nkubu, she has lots of enthusiasm and is very resourceful. Since she was a little girl she has demonstrated her talents and knack for farming. Nkuene is a remote village in the Nkubu area of Kenya where people live in mud houses and in dismal conditions.

But within the remote village of Nkuene, Purity is working hard to pull herself out of the dismal conditions. Most small-holder farmers view Purity as a role model and a mentor because of the resilience that she has despite personal challenges, and her passion to support her two children as primary caregiver. Purity started farming in 2007 after the country suffered post-election violence. With the unstinting support of her husband, who dedicated his 1 acres, she has grown the business dramatically. She has acquired numerous income-generating assets, including farm machines. She keeps dairy cattle and grows subsistence and commercial crops, such as maize. She takes pride in being independent and being involved in a sector that feeds the population.

Purity is seeking a loan to buy farm implements such as modern farming tools and seeds. Her operations are growing consistently. With your funding, Purity will expand her farming through buying good quality seeds and using modern farming inputs. The additional income will enable her to repay the loan, buy food for her family, and pay fees for her two children who are in public school. She feels blessed to have the support of her husband, through all her undertakings.

loans.use: to buy farm implements

loans.name: Nazgul

texts.ru: Назгул успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. На сегодняшний день, Назгул имеет 10 коров, 20 овец. На 1,0 Га земли она выращивает кукурузу для внутрихозяйственного потреблений. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет 14,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Назгул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Назгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Nazgul successfully paid back her loan, having used it for the intended purpose. She is grateful to Kiva and everyone who helped her with the financing. Nazgul currently has ten cows and twenty sheep. She grows corn for use on the farm and earns 14,000 som (KGS) per month. In order to expand her farm, Nazgul applied for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) with Bai Tushum Bank to buy calves to fatten and sell. Nazgul plans to use the earnings from the loan to invest  in the further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to buy calves for fattening and resale

loans.name: Sitoine

texts.en:
This loan helps Sitoine get connected to his local prepay microgrid.

Sitoine runs a small business and lives with his wife and their 4 kids in the town of Les Anglais in southern Haiti. Their white and blue house has no reliable access to electricity and thus Sitoine is forced to use costly and harmful kerosene for lighting. With all of of his kids still at school, he wishes they had better light for studying at night. A solar-powered microgrid is being installed in Les Anglais, giving Sitoine and his family the opportunity to connect to a higher quality, lower-cost energy source. He is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to cover the upfront cost of connection to the grid, which he will repay through his payments for electricity.

An electrical connection dramatically reduces the cost of lighting in towns such as Les Anglais while offering far superior light quality and more generally providing opportunities for people to dramatically improve their quality of life.

To see a video of Les Anglais and the hybrid solar grid, please click the link below.

loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid.

loans.name: Carmen Cecilia

texts.es:
En el recinto Virgen del Cisne, un sector con una de las mejores producciones del cantón de Santo Domingo vive Carmen una joven señora de 26 años, la acompaña su esposo y su hija.
Carmen y su esposo son personas muy trabajadoras,  mientras él se dedica a trabajar como jornalero en fincas ella se encarga de criar chanchos, cuenta con unas pequeñas chanceras en su domicilio, tienen varios chanchitos a los cuales los alimenta todos los días, ya cada quince los vende, también cría pollos pero en menor cantidad.
Carmen desde la mañana se dedica a sus animales, una vez terminada las tareas va a dejar a su pequeña hija a la escuela, ya por la tarde al retirarla les da nuevamente el alimento y limpia las chancheras; los fines de semana cuando con la ayuda de su esposo salen a vender los animales.
Carmen gracias a KIVA y a este crédito podrá mejorar las chancheras ya que actualmente no están en tan buen estado, también podrá comprar unos chanchitos que están en buen precio y aprovechar esta oportunidad para seguir fortaleciéndose.
texts.en:
In the Virgen del Cisne precinct, an area with one of the best productions in the Santo Domingo canton, lives Carmen, a 26-year-old woman, with her husband and their daughter. Carmen and her husband are very hardworking people. While he works as a day laborer on farms, she is in charge of raising pigs; she has a few small pig pens near her home. She has a number of pigs that she feeds each day and sells every two weeks. She also raises chickens but in smaller quantities.

Carmen dedicates herself to her animals in the morning. Once those tasks are done she goes to take her small daughter to school. When she goes to pick her daughter up in the afternoon, she gives the animals food once again and cleans the pig pens. On weekends, with her husband's help, she goes out to sell the animals.

Thanks to Kiva and to this loan, Carmen will be able to improve the pig pens, which are not currently in good condition. She will also be able to buy a few pigs at a good price and take advantage of this opportunity of keep strengthening her business.

loans.use: to improve her pig pens and to buy more pigs, taking advantage of this increase to strengthen her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid

loans.name: Gilet

texts.en:
This loan helps Gilet get connected to his local solar-powered  microgrid. Gilet lives in the town of Les Anglais in southern Haiti. His house has no reliable access to electricity and thus Gilet is forced to use costly and harmful kerosene for lighting. A solar-powered microgrid is being installed in Les Anglais, giving Gilet and his family the opportunity to connect to a higher quality, lower-cost energy source. He is looking forward to being connected as it will allow him to save money. He is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to cover the upfront cost of connection to the grid, which he will repay through his payments for electricity.

An electrical connection dramatically reduces the cost of lighting in towns such as Les Anglais while offering far superior light quality and more generally providing opportunities for people to dramatically improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first solar-powered microgrid

loans.name: Ma. Cristina

texts.en:
Ma. Cristina is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ma. Cristina is 39 years old and has four children who are still in school.

Ma. Cristina has a buy-and-sell personal collection business in the Philippines.

Ma. Cristina requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more personal collection products like body lotion, beauty soap, perfume, cosmetics and other personal care products.

Ma. Cristina has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more personal collection products like body lotion, beauty soap, perfume, cosmetics and other personal care products.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Rosemarie works hard to support her family. She has a tailoring business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from frozen foods.

Rosemarie is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy materials needed like thread and other supplies for her tailoring business.

Rosemarie has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials needed like thread and other supplies.

loans.name: Mila

texts.en:
Mila is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a restaurant business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, noodles, eggs, fish, etc for her restaurant business.

Mila has been in this business for six years. She earns more income from rice retailing.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Mila has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, noodles, eggs, fish, etc.

loans.name: Corazon De Maria Group

texts.es:
Diana es una mujer de 22 años de edad, soltera, tiene un hijo de 6 meses y su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora y muy responsable. Su negocio lo realiza en la localidad ‘el torno’ área rural que acopia la mayor parte de la producción agrícola del lugar. 
Diana es trigueña, de cabello castaño y físico robusto (la segunda de la derecha, viste pantalón corto celeste). Su vida la comparte con su bebé que está recién nacido, vive en casa de sus padres que es propia y está construida de madera y cuenta con energía eléctrica y agua de pozo. Las ganas de mejorar su negocio para ayudarse con los gastos de su bebé, la llevo a liderar una banca de personas con negocios como; elaboración de sombreros de sao, confección de tejidos, agricultura, venta de verduras, venta de huevo, venta de productos naturales para la salud y venta de ropa de segunda mano. Su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional, ella cocina ‘k'jaras’ a la brasa, que se elabora con mote, papas, chuletas de cerdo y el cuerillo, aprendí a cocinar este plato porque está de moda y existe buena demanda…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que su comida tiene gran demanda, la desventaja es la falta de insumos de cocina como; carne, mote, aceite, papas y otros, para cocinar a diario. Su sueño es darle una vida mejor a su hijo, ella desea comprar insumos de cocina para cocinar diariamente comida tradicional. 
Es por esos motivos que Diana solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos de cocina para cocinar comida típica a diario.
texts.en: Diana is a twenty-two year old woman, single, with a six-month-old boy. Her business is selling traditional foods. She is a good mother, hard-working and very responsible. She conducts her business in the "el torno" rural area where most of the agriculture production takes place. She has a dark complexion, with brown hair and a robust frame (she is second from the right in the photo, wearing bright blue shorts). She shares her life with her baby, and lives in her parents' house which they own; it is constructed of wood and has electricity and running water. Her desire to improve her business to better support her son compelled her to join a communal bank with other people running businesses including: making hats, making textiles, agriculture, selling vegetables, selling eggs, selling natural health products, and selling second-hand clothing. Her business is selling traditional foods, she makes grilled 'k'jaras', a traditional dish of chargrilled pork with boiled corn, potatoes, and pork rinds. She learned how to make this dish because "it's popular and there is a lot of demand," she comments. The advantage of her business is the food is in great demand, the disadvantage is the scarcity of ingredients such as meat, corn, oil, potatoes and more, to be able to cook every day. Her dream is to give her son a better life, she wants to buy ingredients to be able to cook every day. For these reasons Diana is applying for a loan to buy ingredients to cook typical dishes every day.

loans.use: to buy kitchen supplies to prepare traditional foods daily.

loans.name: Chichi

texts.en:
Chichi is a 36-year-old married woman with four children. A year ago, she started selling snack food to the nearby school in her place. She sold camote cue (sweet potatoes deep fried with caramelized sugar,) gulaman drink (which is sweet and thirst-quenching), and cassava suman (made of grated cassava, grated coconut, white granulated sugar and wrapped in banana leaves).

She is very industrious and also a sacrificing mother who deprives herself for the sake of her children.

She has requested a loan from Kiva's field partner CEVI to buy ingredients like camote (sweet potatoes), bananas and cassava.

With these, Chichi could slowly expand her livelihood and able to roll out her product. Thus, she could slowly pay her obligations and continue to provide for the needs of her family.

Chichi hopes in the future that she will become successful in order to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like camote (sweet potatoes), bananas and cassava.

loans.name: Suyun

texts.ru: Суйун успешно погасила кредит, использовав средства по назначению. Она очень благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве Суйун на данный момент 18 коров, 8 лошадей и стадо овец. На 1,20 Га собственной и 2,0 Га арендованной земли она выращивает перец и клевер для реализации. Суйун обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 16 овец для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Суйун планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота, что позволит накопить на завершение строительства жилого дома.
texts.en: Suyun successfully repaid her loan, having used it for the intended purpose. She is very grateful to Kiva and everyone who helped her with the financing. Suyun currently has 18 cows, 8 horses and a herd of sheep. She grows pepper and clover to sell on a 1.2 hectare plot of her own land and 2.0 hectares of rented land. Suyun applied for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) with Bai Tushum Bank to buy 16 sheep to fatten and resell. She plans to use the earnings from the loan to invest in increasing her livestock headcount in the future, which will allow her to save money to finish building a house.

loans.use: to purchase sheep to fatten and resell

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
As a single parent, Lorna works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from a general store. Lorna is borrowing PHP 11000 through NWTF to buy ingredients such as meat, vegetables, etc. for her food vending business.

Lorna has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as meat, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Madelyn

texts.en:
Madelyn is 44 years old and married with five children.

Madelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, bread, snack foods and other personal care products.

Madelyn has borrowed and paid 1 loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

Madelyn aspires to save money to provide for and secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, bread, snack foods and other personal care products.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Maricel is 34 years old and has three children who are in school.

Maricel has a bicycle transport business in the Philippines. Maricel requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy spare parts and other materials needed in her business.

Maricel has been in this business for 7 years. In the future, Maricel would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and other materials needed in her business

loans.name: Susanie

texts.en:
Susanie works hard to support her family. Susanie is a widow and has a buy-and-sell rice grains business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice grains to sell.

Susanie has been in this business for 5 years now.

In the future, Susanie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice grains to sell

loans.name: Budi

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! We’d like you to meet one of Ruma agents, Budi. Budi lives in Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. He is happily married and lives there with his wife. He owns a small stall that sells daily consumer products and mobile airtime credits for his community. He decided to join Ruma because he already heard that Ruma has the best service and system and he wants to expand his business with Ruma.

Budi is a friendly person and his community sees him as an informative mobile provider. As the business grows, Budi needs additional capital and is seeking a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to sell to his community. As seen in the photo, Budi is the one who is sitting in his stall. He is thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile airtime credits to sell to his community.

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en: Salvacion is 53 years old, married with nine children. Salvacion works hard to provide for her family. She has run a general store in the Philippines for 11 years, and she also earns income from poultry. She requested a 5000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, bread, snack foods, and other personal care products. Salvacion has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. Salvacion aspires to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell

loans.name: Virgie

texts.en: Virgie works hard to support her family. Virgie is married, and she sells rice in the Philippines, which she has done for five years. She requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional rice to sell. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional rice to sell

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Rebecca, 41, is a married woman with four children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Rebecca has a fruit vending business in the Philippines, which she has been running for eight years. Rebecca requested a 24,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy a variety of fruits to sell. In the future, Rebecca would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fruits to sell

loans.name: Maunise

texts.fr: Maunise a 27 ans. Elle est mère célibataire. Elle vit avec ses deux enfants dans la ville de Léogane. Elle fait le commerce de produits cosmétiques en détail. Cela lui permet d’avoir un peu d’argent pour couvrir les dépenses quotidiennes. Mais son rêve est de devenir autonome financièrement. Elle est à la recherche de fonds pour augmenter son stock de marchandises.
texts.en:
Maunise is 27 years old. She is a single mother. She lives with her two children in the town of Léogane.

She sells cosmetics to retail customers. This allows her to earn some money to cover the daily expenses. But her dream is to become financially self-sufficient. She is looking for funds so that she can increase her inventory of merchandise.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of beauty products.

loans.name: Ana María

texts.es:
Ana, de 34 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudió hasta quinto grado, debido a que no tenía los recursos económicos necesario para seguir estudiando; está acompañada, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y juntos tienen 3 hijos, los 2 mayores no estudian solamente le ayudan en el trabajo agrícola y el tercer hijo está aún pequeño y asiste a la escuela.  

Ana, ha trabajado en la agricultura desde la edad de 15 años, ella junto a su pareja trabajan la agricultura para sacar adelante a su familia y en tiempos de cosecha se levantan a las 4:00 de la mañana, para hacer el desayuno y luego se van para el campo a trabajar a una distancia de 1 kilómetro aproximadamente.- Pero Ana, para generar más ingresos y ayudar a su familia, decidió comenzar a vender productos por catalogo como lociones, desodorantes, entre otros y para veneder tiene que visitar casa por casa para promover los productos a sus vecinos.

Ana, necesita el préstamo para comprar semilla, abono, pesticidas, prepar la tierra y pagar mano de obra.

El sueño de Ana, es obtener una buena cosecha para cancelar a tiempo su préstamo y mejorar las condiciones de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Ana, 34, left school after the fifth grade because her family didn't have the money for her to go on.  She is partnered now and she and her husband, a farmer, have 3 children.  The two oldest children are no longer in school and help on the farm.  The youngest child is in school. 

Ana has worked on farms since she was 15-years old.  She and her husband work together on the farm to support the family and that means, among other things, getting up at 4:00am during harvests to make breakfast before leaving for her fields which are about a kilometer away.  Ana also has a business reselling products that she buys from catalogs: lotions, deodorants, etc.

Ana is applying for a loan that she will use to pay for the labor and supplies she needs--seeds, fertilizer, etc.--for the family's next planting.  

Ana's greatest wish is for a good harvest so that she can pay off her loan and better provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her farming business.

loans.name: Senorita

texts.fr: Senorita est dans la revente de produits cosmétiques depuis 3 ans.  A 23 ans, mère d’une jeune enfant, elle  rêve de devenir une grande commerçante et d’avoir une vie financière stable. Elle demande un prêt pour augmenter son stock de lotion de beauté.
texts.en:
Senorita has been selling cosmetics for 3 years. At 23 years of age and mother of one small child, she dreams of becoming a large retailer and of having a financially stable life.

She is requesting a loan so that she can increase her inventory of beauty lotions.

loans.use: to buy beauty lotions.

loans.name: Sherlyne

texts.fr: Sherlyne a 31 ans. Elle et mariée et mère de trois enfants. Les revenus de son mari n’étant pas suffisants pour répondre à tous les besoins de la famille, elle a décidé de créer une activité génératrice de revenus afin d’apporter sa contribution dans le foyer. Elle revend des produits alimentaires tels que : sucre, huile, farine, riz haricot, spaghetti, etc. Elle sollicite un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock de spaghetti et de farine.
texts.en:
Sherlyne is 31 years old. She is married and the mother of 3 children. Her husband's income not being large enough to cover all the family's needs, she decided to start a revenue-generating activity in order to be able to contribute to the household. She sells food products like sugar, oil, flour, rice, beans, and spaghetti.

She is requesting a microloan so that she can increase her inventory of spaghetti and flour.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of spaghetti and flour.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa, de 59 años de edad, es madre de 3 hijos, todos ya formaron sus propias familias y son independientes, ella solo estudio hasta sexto grado, porque sus padres no contaban con la capacidad económica para ayudarle a que continuara estudiando; está casada y su esposo se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura.

Teresa, tiene 30 años de dedicarse a vender pan dulce, su madre le enseño esta actividad desde que era muy pequeña, pero además de eso también elabora queso fresco para vender en su casa y tiene cultivos de granos básicos junto a su esposo; su lugar preferido de venta es el cantón, aunque a veces debe recorrer aproximadamente 4 kilometros por día para vender toda su mercadería. 

Teresa, necesita el préstamo para comprar harina, levadura, leña y azúcar para elaborar pan y para ampliar más su negocio y obtener una mejor ganancia, para darle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.

Teresa, sueña con ampliar mucho más su negocio y poder montar una panadería con maquinaria industrial y también comprar ganado para vender más queso y leche.
texts.en:
Teresa, 59 years old, is the mother of 3 children, all of whom have already started their own families and are independent. She only went to school through the sixth grade, because her parents didn't have the financial means to help her continue her education. She is married, and her husband makes his living working in agriculture.

Teresa has been selling sweet breads for 30 years. Her mother taught her this business when she was very young. In addition to this, she also makes fresh cheese to sell from her house, and with her husband, she has some staple food crops.

The place where she prefers to sell is the rural community, although she sometimes has to travel approximately 4 kilometers a day in order to sell all her goods.

Teresa needs the loan to buy flour, yeast, firewood, and sugar, in order to make bread and to expand her business and earn more money, so she can give her family better living conditions.

Teresa dreams of expanding her business a lot more, being able to start a bakery with industrial machinery, and also buying cattle in order to sell more cheese and milk.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, firewood, and sugar, to make bread and to expand her business.

loans.name: Yarleidys

texts.es: Yarleydis es una estilista de 31 años de edad que con sus conocimientos empíricos se motivó a profesionalizarse y tomó estudios en belleza y estética, posteriormente empezó a trabajar en este arte, adicionando su ingreso a la economía de su hogar.  Ella es madre de dos hijos menores de edad y vive con su cónyuge en un barrio de la ciudad de Cartagena de Indias, en esta misma localidad ofrece sus servicios; tratamientos capilares, desrizado, cortes, blower entre otros, a vecinos, amigos, y familiares. Con la expectativa de mejorar sus ingresos, solicitó un crédito, su primer credikiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para comprar productos de peluquería: cremas alisadoras, masajes, shampoo e implementos de trabajo como peinillas, cepillos, ganchos. Su meta a futuro es ampliar la capacidad de su local, así como los servicios que realiza.
texts.en: Yarleydis, 31, is a stylist.  She had a long interest in beauty and esthetics and decided to study for a certification in hair styling so that she could start her own salon.  She lives with her partner in Cartagena de Indias and has two young children.  She draws her customers from family, friends and neighbors and provides a wide range of services: haircuts, hair-straightening, etc.  She is applying to Fundación Mario Santo Domingo for a Kiva loan, her first, that she will use to buy the supplies she needs--brushes, combs, shampoos, straightening creams, etc.--to carry on her business.  For the future, she wants to expand her shop and the services that she can provide.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her salon business.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 44 years old, married and has 11 children, three of whom attend school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Lolita has a shell craft business in the Philippines, which she has been doing for 13 years.

Lolita requested a loan from NWTF for 15,000 PHP, which she will use to buy shells and other materials needed in her business. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase shells and other materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Evanie

texts.fr: Evanie, 35 ans, est mariée. Elle vit avec son mari et leurs deux enfants. Elle revend des vêtements usagés. Cela fait six ans qu’elle exerce cette activité.  Elle a besoin d’un prêt pour augmenter son stock. A l’avenir, elle souhaite gagner suffisamment de revenus pour épargner un peu d’argent.
texts.en:
Evanie, who is 35 years old, is married. She lives with her husband and their two children. She sells used clothing. She has been doing this for 6 years.

She needs a loan in order to be able to increase her inventory. In the future, she would like to earn enough money to be able to build some savings.

loans.use: to buy some second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Monique

texts.fr: Monique, 43 ans, vit en union libre. Elle n’a pas encore d’enfant. Elle vend des produits alimentaires. Cette activité lui permet de gagner un peu de revenus pour faire vivre sa famille. Elle a fait une demande de prêt pour pourvoir acheter plus de marchandises afin d’augmenter ses chiffres de vente.
texts.en:
Monique, who is 43 years old, lives in a civil union. She does not yet have children. She sells food products. This business enables her to earn a living for her family.

She is requesting a loan so that she can buy more merchandise and increase her sales.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of products.

loans.name: Los Carreteros Group

texts.es:
Ana continúa con su negocio de venta de asaditos de pollo (la segunda de la derecha, viste blusa coloreada y pantalón corto negro). El crédito que obtuvo lo utilizó para comprar un refrigerador para conservar los alimentos frescos, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque pudo trabajar sin problemas. Actualmente lidera la banca de emprendimiento, los negocios de los socios siguen funcionando y mejorando, “pude comprar lo que necesitaba y mi negocio mejoró en calidad y tiempo…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con ventas a diario, la desventaja es la falta de insumos para cocinar todo el mes. Su sueño es aumentar sus ventas para mejorar sus ingresos, ella desea comprar insumos de cocina como aceite, fideo, arroz, carne y otros para cocinar durante todo el mes. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 20 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Ana solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos de cocina para vender comida durante todo el mes.
texts.en:
Ana still has her business selling roast chickens. (She is the second on the right, wearing a colourful blouse and black shorts.)

She used the last loan to buy a refridgerator to store the fresh ingredients. Her repayments were punctual as she was able to work without problems.

She currently leads the communal bank. The members' business continue to work and improve.
"I was able to buy what I needed, and my business improved in quality and time" she says.

The advantage of her business is that she sells every day. The disadvantage is that she doesn't always have ingredients to cook for the whole month.

Her dream is to increase her sales to improve her income. She wishes to buy ingredients such as oil, noodles, rice and meat, as well as other things, so that she is able to keep cooking all month. This is her second loan cycle with the institution in the 20 years that she has been working in this business.

It is for these reasons that Ana is requesting a loan, to buy cooking ingredients, so that she can sell food for the whole month.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients, so that she can sell food for the whole month.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is the mother of four grown children. She earns a living by selling bottled mineral water. She has been engaged in this kind of business for 5 years now, serving locals and town dwellers in her area. She resides in the rural town of Dauis, Bohol. 

At the moment, she has a shortage of funds to purchase more stock to make her business productive. Delia has requested a loan to buy additional supplies of mineral water so that she will able to cope with demand and slowly improve her financial income.

In the future, Delia is determined to become successful in her chosen field.

loans.use: to buy additional supplies of mineral water.

loans.name: Diana Elizabeth

texts.es: Diana tiene 26 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos, Alex de 6 años y Katty de 4 años gracias al esfuerzo y dedicación, sus hijos pueden asistir a la escuela, en su localidad, ella  se dedica a la crianza de pollos  para ayudarse en los gastos de su hogar, por este motivo el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pequeños pollos  para venderlas cuando ya estén en su completo desarrollo, lo que Diana aspira es mejorar su negocio y por medio de este  sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Diana is 26 years old. She is a single mother and has two children, Alex, 6 years old, and Katty, 4 years old. Thanks to her efforts and dedication, her children are able to attend school in their neighborhood.

Diana makes her living raising chickens in order to help with household expenses. That is why she is going to invest the loan in purchasing small chickens so that she can sell them once they are fully developed.

What Diana aspires to is improving her business and getting her children ahead in this way.

loans.use: to buy and sell chickens.

loans.name: Ana Gladis

texts.es:
Ana, de 47 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, tienen tres hijos, uno vive con ella y los demás se independizaron y formaron sus propias familias y económicamente solo un hijo depende de ella. 

Ana, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos desde hace 5 años, una amiga fue quien le enseño y su negocio lo tiene en su casa; pero aparte de eso también hace queso fresco para salir a vender por toda la comunidad y es otra fuente de ingresos que ella posee, su horario de trabajo es de 6:00 de la mañana hasta las 5:00 de la tarde. 

Ana, necesita el préstamo para comprar más cerdos y mejorar las instalaciones donde mantiene a los cerdos, con ello espera mejorar sus ingresos y poder brindar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. 

Ana, sueña con tener una granja de cerdos grande, para que le genere buenas ganancias y poder comprar su propia casa.
texts.en:
Ana, 47 years old, studied until the 5th grade. She has three children -- one lives with her, and the other two are independent and have started their own families. Only one child is financially dependent on her.

Ana has made her living raising pigs for 5 years. It was a friend who taught her, and she has her business at home. But aside from this, she also makes fresh cheese, which she sells throughout the community and which is another source of income for her. Her work schedule is from 6:00 in the morning until 5:00 in the evening.

Ana needs the loan to buy more pigs and to improve the facilities where she keeps them. In this way, she hopes to increase her income and to be able to provide her family with better living conditions.

Ana dreams of having a large pig farm, so that she can earn a good income and buy her own house.

loans.use: to buy more pigs and to improve the facilities where she keeps the pigs.

loans.name: Swetzel

texts.en:
Swetzel is 20 years old, single, and has one child. She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. 

Swetzel has requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig. She has been in this business for 6 years now and has borrowed 1 time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Swetzel would like to save money to provide for and secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig

loans.name: Iladie

texts.fr: Iladie a 32 ans. Elle vit en union libre et a quatre enfants. Pour pouvoir prendre soin de sa famille, elle revend des détergentes en gros. Elle souhaite développer l’activité mais n’en a pas les moyens. Elle a fait une demande de microcrédit pour augmenter son stock.
texts.en:
Iladie is 32 years old. She lives in civil union and has 4 children. In order to be able to take care of her family, she sells detergent wholesale. She would like to develop her business but does not have the means to do this.

She has requested a microloan so that she can increase her inventory.

loans.use: to buy some bags of detergents.

loans.name: Rosenie

texts.fr: Rosenie, 31 ans, vit en union libre. Elle habite à Bon Repos avec son compagnon et leur enfant. Elle revend des boissons afin de trouver de quoi faire vivre sa famille. Auparavant elle ne vendait que des boissons alcoolisées. Maintenant elle veut diversifier son stock en y ajoutant des boissons gazeuses.
texts.en:
Rosenie, who is 31, lives in a civil union. She lives in Bon Repos with her partner and their child. 

She sells drinks in order to earn a living for her family. Before, she used to sell only alcohol. Now she would like to diversify her stock by adding soft drinks.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El es un señor casado tiene 70 años de edad, recibe una cantidad mensual como pensión, en ocasiones realiza trabajos de albañilería por que su pensión no le es suficiente para sus gastos y servicios. Sufre de cataratas en ambos ojos, el mas afectado es el derecho ya que ha perdido la visión totalmente. Al señor le preocupa que suceda lo mismo en el ojo izquierdo  y pueda quedar ciego. Sus recursos son insuficientes para solventar el tratamiento.
texts.en:
