The main hardship that Hiệu faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more healthy cows for reproducing and the necessary equipment to upgrade her business productivity.
This is Hiệu's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. She hopes that this loan could improve her living standards. In the future, Hiệu hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

Hiệu is the group leader of "Never give up", which consists of four members.

loans.use: To purchase more healthy cows for reproducing and the necessary equipment to upgrade her business productivity.

loans.name: Wenifreda

texts.en:
Wenifreda is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 58 years old now.

Wenifreda has a buy-and-sell rice business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 4,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

Wenifreda has been in this business for one year. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Nora Lourdisita

texts.en:
Nora Lourdisita is a married woman with nine children, four of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur who is 43 years old.

She has a coconut wine vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy containers of coconut wine to sell.

Nora Lourdisita has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy containers of coconut wine to sell.

loans.name: Pridon

texts.en:
Pridon, who is 48 years old, lives in the village of Kumisi. His family members are his wife and little daughter.

Since it's very difficult to find any stable job in this region, Pridon's wife started a trading business with clothing and home products. She creates the only income to satisfy the family's increasing needs.

Pridon wants to do his bit for the family's welfare and to generate his own income. He sought credit from local financial institutions, but his attempts were unsuccessful because of his poor living conditions.

A startup program, that is joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, enables rural poor and inexperienced people to get a loan to start or re-start businesses. Under the framework of this program, Pridon's application was approved, so he could get a loan of GEL 900 to purchase a second-hand car and start serving local people as a taxi driver. He will generate daily income and will tackle the financial difficulties.

The family's living conditions will significantly improve and the family will have enough income to access regular credit products available on the country’s capital market, in case of need.

Pridon will be very thankful for the loan.

loans.use: to purchase a car and start working as a taxi driver.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Teresita works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming seaweed and a general store. Teresita is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fishing net for her business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Teresita has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net for her business

loans.name: Gull Naya

texts.en:
Gull Naya is 38 years old, married, and the mother of seven children. Her husband is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his rickshaw, which is always in bad condition. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now his rickshaw requires proper maintenance to keep it in a functional state.

For this reason, Gull Naya has contacted Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for a loan so that her husband can repair his rickshaw. He wants to repair one wheel and the engine’s piston and wants to pay the labor costs. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transportation services to his passengers.

Gull Naya is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business. She thanks Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to repair her husband's rickshaw.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 33 years old and married, with one child who is in school.

She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Rose has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Haingo

texts.fr:
Haingo est couturière de formation. Elle démarrait la pratique en 2008, elle confectionne en série des jupes et les vend sur le marché. A part son lieu de vente, il y a des revendeurs en province qui achètent en gros et cherchent eux-mêmes les articles chez elle. C'est une activité un peu dure mais intéressante. En plus, Haingo est travailleuse infatigable et débrouillarde. Elle voudrait améliorer la qualité des produits et produire beaucoup, c'est pourquoi elle voudrait acquérir une machine piqueuse industrielle.
Elle est mariée et son époux est chauffeur de taxi-bus, le couple se soutienne bien mutuellement pour le bien-être de leur deux filles. Ces dernières ont 9 et 16 ans et sont scolarisés dans une école privée. Elles sont en classe 8ème et Terminale. Haingo a actuellement 37 ans.
texts.en:
Haingo is an apprentice seamstress. In 2008, she started putting together a series of skirts and selling them on the market. Aside from her market place, there are retailers in the country, who buy in bulk and seek out for themselves articles from her. It's a difficult business, but it's interesting. Additionally, Haingo is an inexhaustible and resourceful worker. She would like to improve the quality and quantity of her product, which is why she would like to purchase an industrial sewing machine.

Haingo is 37 years old, married and her husband is a taxi-bus driver. The couple is very mutually supportive for the wellbeing of their two daughters. The daughters are ages 9 and 16 and are attending a private school. One is in fifth grade, the other is a senior in high school.
Elle est mariée et son époux est chauffeur de taxi-bus, le couple se soutienne bien mutuellement pour le bien-être de leur deux filles. Ces dernières ont 9 et 16 ans et sont scolarisés dans une école privée. Elles sont en classe 8ème et Terminale.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Jocelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fishing. She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc., for her general store business.

Jocelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 31 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Blanca Luz

texts.es: Blanca es una mujer trabajadora de 51 años de edad que se dedica a la venta de productos de elote como son tamales, riguas, atol, tortas, entre otros. Blanca vive en casa de su propiedad junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 31, 16 y 14 años de edad. Blanca desea terminar de construir un cuarto en su vivienda, ya que como se observa en la fotografía, ya tiene las bases pero por falta de liquidez económica no ha logrado concluirlo, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: ladrillo, cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para terminar de construir un cuarto en su vivienda.
texts.en: Blanca is a hard-working 51-year-old woman who makes a living selling corn products such as tamales, corn cakes, corn flour drinks, and cornbread, among others.  Blanca lives in a house that she owns together with her husband and their 3 children who are 31, 16 and 14 years of age.  Blanca wishes to finish building a room in her home, which, as can be seen in the photo, already has a foundation.  However, due to her lack of liquidity, Blanca has not been able to complete the room.  For this reason, she is seeking a loan from FUSAI to invest in: bricks, cement, sand, gravel, and iron to finish building a room in her house.

loans.use: to invest in: bricks, cement, sand, gravel, and iron to finish building a room in her house.

loans.name: Fermin Sebastian

texts.es: Fermín es un hombre de 24 años de edad que se dedica a la venta plantas ornamentales, árboles frutales, cocos, bebidas frías, entre otros productos actividad que realiza a la orilla de una carretera muy transitada. Fermín ha logrado obtener su vivienda propia desde hace 3 años, por lo que se siente feliz, ya que siente esto es una gran tranquilidad para su seguridad. Fermín desea invertir en los productos necesarios para sus negocios, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cocos, semillas de marañón, plantas ornamentales y árboles frutales para mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en: Fermin is a 24-year-old man that works selling ornamental plants, fruit trees, coconuts, cold drinks and other products.  He works on this activity at the side of a very transited road.  Fermin was able to get his own home three years ago, this makes him happy because it’s a great relief to feel secure.  He wants to invest in the necessary products for his business, this is why he requests a loan to FUSAI to invest in: coconuts, cashew nuts, ornamental plants, fruit trees and this way improve his earnings

loans.use: to buy coconuts, cashew nuts, ornamental plants, fruit trees and this way improve his earnings.

loans.name: Mbayuwayu Group

texts.en:
Kamilius is in his mid-30s and he is married, with two school-aged children. He has been a tailor for 17 years now. He works from 7am to 9pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be his second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. Kamilius used his previous loan to buy sewing products and he has successfully paid back his loan. He used the profit to pay school fees, repay the loan, and cover household expenses.

Kamilius will use this loan to buy good materials to make current-styled suits and women's dresses. He dreams of buying more suit and other materials.

Kamilius will share this loan with his loan group, Mbayuwayu Group, which has seven members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy good materials to make current-styled suits and women's dresses.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is 34 years old and married with two children. With two children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Agnes runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 24,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like bread, canned goods, junk food, home product care, and other groceries.

She has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap, and other groceries.

In the future, Agnes would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like bread, canned goods, junk food, home product care, and other groceries.

loans.name: Lia Margarita

texts.es: Lia es una joven comerciante de 27 años de edad que reside en un barrio de Soledad en compañía de su cónyuge y su hija de dos años, ella tomó la iniciativa de ayudar a su pareja con los gastos del hogar y emprendió su negocio de ventas de artículos para el hogar por intermedio de una empresa multinivel que le suministra catálogos especializados en estos productos, lo que le permite promover ventas con tan solo exhibirlo,  así garantiza solamente comprar los productos que le solicitan sus clientes.  Lia está muy feliz de generar ingresos y ofrecer bienestar a su familia y mucho más porque puede continuar con sus roles sin inconvenientes.  Como su capital no es ostentoso, necesita un préstamo que le permita cubrir los requerimientos de sus clientes, es por ello que aplicó a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para comprar cobertores, juegos de sábanas, vajillas, toallas, planchas para el cabello y demás pedidos que le realicen sus clientes, inversión que le permitirá ampliar sus ventas y tener más utilidades.  A futuro ella se proyecta en su propio almacén y brindándole a su hija una excelente educación académica.
texts.en:
Lia is a young merchant, 27 years old, who lives in a neighborhood of Soledad in the company of her spouse and her two-year-old daughter. She took the initiative to help her partner with the household expenses, and she started a business selling items for the home, through a multi-level company which provides these products from specialized catalogs. This allows her to promote sales simply by showing them, thus ensuring that she only has to buy products that have been requested by her customers.

Lia is very happy to be able to generate income and offer well-being to her family and much more, because she can continue in her roles without inconvenience. Because her capital is not abundant, she needs a loan which will allow her to cover her customers' needs. For this reason, she has applied for her first Kiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation to buy blankets, sheet sets, towels, dishes, hair irons and other items which her customers have ordered. This investment will permit her to expand her sales and obtain more profits. In the future she sees herself having her own store and providing her daughter with an excellent academic education.

loans.use: to buy blankets, sheet sets, towels, dishes, hair irons and other items which her customers have ordered.

loans.name: Jeannine

texts.fr:
Jeanine a 51 ans, elle est veuve. Le nombre d’enfants est de deux dont l’un de 10 ans en classe de cinquième vit avec elle, l’ainé de 13 ans vit en province auprès d’une famille. 
Jeanine est grossiste de fruits. Elle s’est lancée dans l’activité de commerce depuis 1989 en vendant des bonbons, des biscuits et des paquets de cigarettes. De 1989 à 1996, elle travaillait avec un grossiste de fruits et légumes en utilisant son fonds propre dont le montant était encore faible. De 1996 à ce jour, elle s’est mise à son propre compte en tant que grossiste car elle a pu accumuler des fonds. Elle est actuellement à son second prêt pour développer son activité : fournisseur de fruits (ananas) aux marchands. Son activité nécessite beaucoup plus de fonds en raison de l’augmentation des commandes des clients. 
Elle vit dans une maison louée (une chambre).  Cette activité est sa principale source de revenus. L’objectif est de pouvoir constituer une épargne et d’être autonome dans la vie.
texts.en:
Jeanine is 51 years old and a widow. She has two children, one of which is 10 years old in fifth grade and lives with her. The older one of 13 years lives in the countryside with another family.

Jeanine is a fruit merchant. She started herself off in business in 1989 selling candy, cookies, and cigarettes. From 1989 to 1996, she worked with a fruit and vegetable grocer using her own savings, which was still week at the time. From 1996 until now, she started her own business asa grocer since she was able to accumulate enough savings. She is currently on her second loan for developing her business as a fruit (pineapple) provider for merchants. Her business requires a lot of credit because of the increase in client orders.

She lives in a room she rents in a house. This business is her main source of income. Her goal is to be able to acquire a savings fund and to be autonomous in her life.

loans.use: to buy pineapples.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: ELLA ES UNA JOVEN QUE VIVE CON SU ABUELA PATERNA DESDE QUE FALLECIERON SUS PAPAS CUANDO ERA NIÑA. SE ENCUENTRA SUMAMENTE PREOCUPADA POR SU ABUELA DEBIDO A QUE FUE ATROPELLADA Y SUFRIÓ LA AMPUTACIÓN DE SU PIERNA DERECHA, POR LO QUE NECESITA UNA PRÓTESIS PARA PODER RECUPERAR SU NIVEL DE VIDA. DESAFORTUNADAMENTE LOS INGRESOS QUE RECIBE NO LE ALCANZAN PARA PODER ADQUIRIR LA PRÓTESIS.
texts.en: She is a young woman who lives with her paternal grandmother since her parents passed away when  she was a child. She is greatly concerned for her grandmother due to the fact that she was hit by a car and suffered the amputation of her right leg, so she needs a prosthesis so that she can recover her level of functioning. Unfortunately the income she receives is not enough to acquire the prosthesis.

loans.use: A loan of $925 helps this borrower to obtain a prosthesis.

loans.name: Adolfo

texts.es:
Adolfo, de 59 años de edad, soltero, tiene dos hijos, vive en una de las colonias del municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara junto a uno de sus hijos, Don Adolfo siempre se ha dedicado al comercio desde hace 7 años decidió dedicarse a la venta de sandalias y hamacas de todo tipo de forma ambulante lo cual le a ayudado a mantenerse económicamente.
Él esta solicitando la cantidad de 15,000.00 Lempiras para comprar mas calzado tipo sandalias para vender. Esta inversión le ayudara a incrementar su inventario, igualmente las ventas e ingresos. Su sueño es seguir trabajando para hacer crecer mas su negocio y con las ganancias obtenidas mejorara su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Adolfo is 59 years old and single, with two children. He lives in one of the neighborhoods of the municipality of Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara, together with one of his children. Adolfo has always dedicated himself to trade, and seven years ago he decided to work selling sandals and hammocks of all types as a mobile vendor. This has helped him to support himself economically.

He is requesting the amount of 15,000 Lempiras to buy more sandal-tyoe footwear to sell. This investment will help him to increase his inventory, and thus his sales and his income. His dream is to keep working to expand his business, and to improve his quality of life with the earnings he obtains.

loans.use: to buy a bulk lot of sandals to sell.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.en:
Rafael is 53 years old, married and has a child. He lives in Tambogrande, Piura, Perú and grows organic mangoes.
Rafael needs US$1500 as loan for fertilizing the fields and increasing his organic mangoes production. With the additional income, he will improve his family’s house.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers to improve a mangoes production

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.en: Edilberto is married and with the help of his wife, they run their business to make a living. He sells a variety of goods and he earns good money from this. Aside from this business, he also manages his farm which earns more income for the family. Edilberto took another loan to buy new variety of seedlings and fertilizer for his crops. In the future, he wants to achieve his dreams of having a better living standard for his family.

loans.use: to buy new variety of seedlings and fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a flowering plants farming business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional seedlings, flower pots, and fertilizers for her flowering plant farming business.

Veronica has been in this business for five years. She earns more income from farming rice and buy and sell vegetables.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Veronica has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of vegetables to sell

loans.name: Laurette

texts.fr:
Laurette  a 30 ans. Le conjoint est un charpentier qui travaille en province, et c’est elle qui touche son salaire mensuel dans la capitale. Le conjoint ne rejoint la famille que les jours de fête (noël, pâques, fête de l’armée. . .). Le nombre d’enfants est de trois (13-11-4 ans) tous scolarisés mais l’un dans une école privée.  
Elle s’est  lancée dans l’activité de petit commerce depuis 2002. Elle s’approvisionne auprès des grands magasins pour revendre les produits à la place du marché.  Elle vendait des blousons de 2002 à 2004, du café de 2001 à 2007. Elle est  actuellement à son quatrième prêt pour développer l’activité. Elle connaît bien le marché : les besoins des clients (nature des produits)  et les prix pour lesquels l’activité est rentable. Elle commençait à vendre les casquettes, ceintures, slip, soutiens et chaussettes depuis 2007.
La famille vit dans une maison à une seule chambre très étroite. Le couple prévoit de construire une maison en bois en 2016, car un terrain a déjà été acquis. Malgré la longue absence de son mari, Laurette arrive à gérer son activité et la vie de la famille.
texts.en:
Laurette is thirty years old. Her spouse is a carpenter, who works in the countryside et she is the one who uses his monthly salary in the capital. Her spouse is rarely at home except for holidays (Christmas, Easter, 'Army Day'). She has three children (ages 4, 11, and 13), who are all in school, but one is in a private school.

She started her small business in 2002. She resupplies at large stores, then retails the product at the market in the square. She was selling jackets from 2002 to 2004 and coffee from 2001 to 2007. She is currently on her fourth loan for developping her business. She knows the market well: the needs of her clients (the nature of the product) and the prices for which the business is rentable. She started selling hats, belts, slips, bras, and socks in 2007.

Her family lives in a very straight single-room house. The couple plans on building a wooden house in 2016, since they already acquired land. Despite her husband being away so long, Laurette is able to manage her business and family lives.

loans.use: to buy hats, shoes, and underwear.

loans.name: Aura Amanda

texts.es: Aura tiene 35 años de edad está casada, su esposo es jornalero y tienen dos hijos Johnson de 15, James de 9 años de edad están estudiando en una escuela gratuita del sector, su negocio es confeccionar piyamas térmicas que luego las vende directamente en el mercado de la localidad, Ella necesita el dinero para comprar una nueva máquina que le permitiría confeccionar más rápidamente la mercancía produciendo mayores ingresos para alimentar, educar, a sus hijos
texts.en: Aura is 35 and is married, her husband is a journeyman. They have two children, Johnson is 15 and James is 9 years old, they go to a public school of the area.  Her business is to make thermal pajamas that she later sells at the local market. She needs the money to buy a new sewing machine that will allow her to make her product faster and this way she will generate more income to feed and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Karen Griselda

texts.es: Karen es una mujer de 27 años de edad que vive en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijas de 2 y 4 años de edad. Karen se dedica a la venta de cocos, bebidas, verduras, entre otros productos a la orilla de la carretera por lo que cuenta con mucha clientela que solicita sus productos. Karen desea invertir en mayor cantidad de productos para ofrecer a su clientela, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cocos, bebidas, verduras, entre otros productos solicitados por sus clientes.
texts.en: Karen is a 27 year old woman that lives in her own house with her partner and two daughters ages two and four.  Karen sells coconuts, drinks, vegetables and other products on the side of the road.  She has many customers that want her products. Karen wants to invest in a larger amount of products to offer her customers, this is why she requests a loan to FUSAI to invest in: coconuts, drinks, vegetables and other products requested by her clients.

loans.use: to buy coconuts, drinks, vegetables and other products requested by her clients

loans.name: Lucie

texts.fr:
Lucie a 25 ans. Le conjoint est un chauffeur de taxi bus. Le nombre d’enfants est de deux (1-5 ans) dont un scolarisé dans une école privé (donc paiement d’un écolage). 
Lucie vend des fournitures scolaires en cette période de rentrée scolaire. L’expérience dans cette activité est de 18 mois. Les articles vendus dépendent de la saison. Elle vend aussi des chaussures. Elle est actuellement à son quatrième prêt pour développer son activité de petit commerce. Elle connait bien le marché et change de produits selon la saison tout en restant dans le domaine du petit commerce.
Le ménage ne paie pas de loyer, il vit dans une maison tout en assurant la sécurité la nuit.  Le rêve du couple est de pouvoir épargner dans le but de réaliser des investissements familiaux dans le futur : construction d’une maison par exemple.
texts.en:
Lucie is 25 years old. Her spouse is a taxi bus driver. They have two children, 1 and 5 years old, one of which is in a private school (thus the tuition costs).

Lucie sells school supplies during the "back to school" time of year. She has had a year and a half of experience in this business. The items she sells depend on the season. She also sells shoes. She is currently on her fourth loan for developing her small business. She knows the market well and changes products according to the season all while staying in the realm of small business.

Le couple doesn't pay rent; they live in a house and run security at night. The couple's dream is to be able to save up enough to invest in the family's future, like building a house, for example.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, colored pencils, markers, pens, paper, and folders.

loans.name: Saul Antonio

texts.es: Saúl es un hombre trabajador de 32 años de edad que se dedica a la venta de cocos, bebidas frías, semillas de marañón horneadas, además cuenta con un vivero, en el cual tiene diversidad de plantas que son muy solicitadas por sus clientes. Saúl vive en casa de su propiedad junto a sus 5 hijos a los que logra sacar adelante además con el apoyo de su compañera de vida. Saúl desea invertir en productos para sus negocios, por lo que solicita un crédito que le permita invertir en: cocos, bebidas, bolsas para sembrar, semillas entre otros para su vivero y su venta de cocos y otras bebidas.
texts.en:
Saúl is a hard working 32 year old man who makes a living selling coconuts, cold drinks, and roasted cashews. He also has a nursery in which he has a variety of plants that are requested often by his customers. Saúl lives in a house that he owns with his 5 children whom he succeeds in supporting also with the help of his life partner.

Saúl wishes to invest in products for his businesses; therefore, he is requesting a loan that will permit him to invest in coconuts, drinks, bags for planting, and seeds, among others, for his nursery and his sales of coconuts and other drinks.

loans.use: to invest in coconuts, drinks, bags for planting, and seeds, among others, for his nursery and his sales of coconuts and other drinks.

loans.name: Bellagie

texts.fr:
Bellagie est mariée, elle a 37 ans. Elle a trois enfants : 19-15-6 ans. Les 2 enfants (19-15 ans) sont nés de son premier époux. Le père du dernier enfant est son second mari qui est un prestataire de service  dans  le domaine de l’informatique (rémunération journalière). 
Elle a exercé plusieurs activités avant : taxi phone de 2004 à 2007 ; vente de sandales de 2010 à 2012. Avec l’appui de son mari, elle a suivi une formation de 2 mois en coiffure en 2012, après elle a ouvert son propre salon de coiffure. Elle a une passion pour cette activité qui constitue sa principale source de revenu actuellement. Elle est actuellement à son quatrième prêt pour réaliser des investissements dans l’activité. L’objectif est de diversifier les services offerts : teinte des cheveux, extension, ...
Le couple habite dans une maison appartenant à ses parents. Elle prévoit l’extension de l’activité : salon de coiffure . Le rêve du couple étant d’ être autonome et de vivre dans leur propre maison.
texts.en:
Bellagie is 37 years old and married. She has three children, ages 6, 15, and 19. The older two were from her first marriage. The father of the youngest is her second husband, who is a service provider in the IT industry (journalistic remuneration)

She has had several businesses in the past: a taxi phone from 2004 to 2007; selling sandals from 2010 to 2012. With the encouragement of her husband, she completed a two-month course in cosmetology in 2012. After, she opened her own hair salon. She has a passion for the business and it's her primary source of revenue currently. She is also on her fourth loan for investing in her business. Her goal is to diversify services offered: hair coloring, extension, etc...

The couple lives in a house belonging to her parents. She plans on expanding her hair salon business. The couple's dream is to be autonomous and to live in their own house.

loans.use: to buy products (shampoo, serum, masks) and materials (mirror, sink).

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes tiene 47 años de edad de estado civil casada tiene 2 hijos David tiene 12 años y Joselyn tiene 13 años estudian en unidades educativas del sector, su esposo es jornalero, le ayuda cuando no tiene trabajo,  dedicada a la fabricación de pequeñas muñecas de tela manualmente que son vendidas en las calles, después de 4 años de elaborar partes de las mismas decidió realizar su propio negocio al principio tenía miedo de venderlas porque pensaba que nadie se interesaría, fue todo lo contrario hoy necesita el dinero para comprar una máquina, fabricaría  más rápidamente, obtendría mayores ingresos para  pagar el lugar donde viven, alimentación y educación de sus hijos.
texts.en: Mercedes is 47 years old and in a civil marriage.  She has 2 children: David is 12 years old and Joselyn is 13 years old.  They study in charter schools in the area.  Her husband is a day laborer, and he helps her when he does not have work.  For work, she manually makes small fabric dolls which are sold in the streets.  After 4 years of producing them she decided to found her own business.  At first, she was afraid to sell the dolls because she thought that nobody would be interested, but it turned out to be the complete opposite.  Today, she needs money to buy a knitting machine; she would produce more quickly, and she would make more income to pay for her home, food, and her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy a mid-gauge knitting machine.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es: Delia es una mujer de 58 años de edad que cada día muestra su esfuerzo por salir adelante, es por ello que desde hace 32 años se dedica a la venta de ropa, actividad que realiza de forma ambulante en el mercado municipal, además cuenta con clientela dentro de su comunidad que buscan sus productos en su vivienda. Delia vive con su nieto de 13 años de edad al que trata la manera de brindarle lo mejor ya que es una mujer muy cariñosa. Delia desea invertir en su negocio, ya que viene la mejor época para su negocio, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: pantalones, faldas, blusas, camisetas, entre otros productos necesarios para su negocio y ofrecer a su clientela.
texts.en: Delia, 58, demonstrates her efforts to move forward every day. She has been selling clothing for 32 years as a traveling saleswoman at the city market. She also has clients within her community who come to her house to buy products. Delia lives with her 13-year-old grandson. She tries to give him the best and she is a very caring woman. She hopes to invest in her business because the best season for her business is coming. Therefore, she is applying for a loan from FUSAI to invest in pants, skirts, shirts, T-shirts, and other products which she needs for her business and clients.

loans.use: to invest in pants, skirts, shirts, T-shirts, and other products she needs for her business and clients.

loans.name: Tati

texts.en:
Good day lenders! Meet one of KPP UMKM’s clients, Tati, who is a 34-year-old. Tati has been selling chicken eggs and her husband has been an employee for three years.

Tati has asked for a loan of IDR 7,200,000 from KPP-UMKM Syariah. This loan will be used to create sanitary conditions at their home by improving access to sanitation and clean water for the family. Her family's income is insufficient to build toilets and water sources, but Tati will be able to repay the loan received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with sanitation and clean water. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank all lenders.

loans.use: to create sanitary conditions at their home by improving access to sanitation and clean water for the family.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria es una mujer trabajadora de 52 años de edad que se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas y almohadas, lo que le ha permitido desde hace 7 años sacar adelante a su familia. Victoria vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijas de 15 y 12 años de edad. Victoria desea invertir en tela y picado para su elaboración de almohadas, además de maíz por mayor para su venta de tortillas, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: maíz por mayor, tela y picado para su elaboración de almohadas para mejorar sus ingresos económicos y la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Victoria is a 52 year old hardworking woman who works making and selling tortillas and pillows, which has allowed her to support her family for seven years. Victoria lives with her domestic partner and their two daughters, 15 and 12 years old. Victoria wants to invest in fabric and stuffing for the production of pillows, as well as corn at wholesale prices for her tortilla sale. For this, she is requesting a loan to FUSAI to invest in: corn at wholesale prices, fabric and stuffing for the production of pillows to improve her financial income and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in: corn at wholesale prices, fabric and stuffing for the production of pillows to improve her financial income and her family's quality of life.

loans.name: Jose Faustino

texts.es:
José, de 49 años de edad, casado, tiene 3 hijos,  reside en el municipio de Santa Rita, Yoro junto a su esposa y 2 de sus hijos. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, produce maíz, frijoles y piña, también se dedica a la cría de ganado productora de leche.
La producción que mas le genera ingresos es la piña, la cual vende en el mercado de la zona, el a mantenido varios prestamos con la institución para sostener sus cultivos de donde obtiene ingresos que cubren las necesidades de la familia. Actualmente solicita otro préstamo por 5,500.00 Lempiras para comprar fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra para aplicarle a su cultivo de piña, para obtener una mayor producción y conseguir una mejor calidad. Su plan es poder ampliar el área de cultivo para contar con una fuente de ingresos estable y darle mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
José, 49 years old, is married and has 3 children. He resides in the Santa Rita municipality, Yoro, along with his wife and 2 of his children. He has always made a living from agriculture. He grows corn, beans, and pineapples. He also makes a living from raising dairy cattle.

The output that makes the greatest income is pineapple, which he sells in the area’s market. He has maintained several loans with the institution to sustain his crops from which he obtains an income that covers his family’s necessities. 

Currently, he is requesting another loan for 5,500.00 Lempiras to purchase fertilizers and pay labor costs for pineapple cultivation in order to obtain an increased production and get a better quality. His plan is to be able to increase the area that he cultivates to count on a steady source of income and provide a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pay labor costs to cultivate pineapple.

loans.name: Rozee

texts.en:
ROZEE is a 51-year-old married woman and the mother of five children, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her financial condition is not good, so she has to think many times before starting any task.

Her husband has recently started to drive a Moto Rickshaw (a type of three-wheeled rickshaw which is based on a motorbike). This rickshaw is being driven over local roads and for short distances.

Its body is made of polyester, which is not strong enough to bear the bumps and jerks as it is driven over the roads. Now the rickshaw body needs to be replaced because it rattles while driving. This is the reason he wants to buy a new body for his Moto Rickshaw.

ROZEE requested a loan so that her husband can maintain the rickshaw body so that he could drive it smoothly. ROZEE thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a new Moto Rickshaw body for her husband's transportation services.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Maria is 61 years old and has three children who are in school.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy a variety of fish to sell.

Maria has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fish to sell.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna works hard to support her family. She has a business buying and selling bananas in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of bananas to sell. Edna has been in this business for 5 years now.

In the future, Edna would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of bananas to sell

loans.name: Señor De Luren Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por 5 personas responsables a distintas actividades comerciales. Así son las integrantes del grupo comunal. “SEÑOR DE LUREN” una de ellos es la Sra. Adelaida Obdulia de 60 años casada, se dedica al servicio de lavado de ropa todos los días con el mérito de salir adelante. Con su esfuerzo ha logrado mejorar su vivienda y apoyar a su familia. Seguir mejorando su negocio, su mayor deseo es tener un local donde pueda ofrecer más de sus servicios. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá en comprar más insumos (detergente, jabón, suavizantes) y así poder implementar más su local. A la vez la Sra. Adelaida se encuentra sentada a la mano izquierda  y se le distingue con una chompa blanco y negro, se despide con un abrazo a Kiva y Edaprospo. Agradece el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso.
texts.en: A group formed by 5 responsible persons dedicated to different commercial activities. These are the members of the communal group “SEÑOR DE LUREN”. One of them is Adelaida Obdulia. She is 60 years old and married. She works every day in the business of washing clothes in order to support her family. With her effort, she has been able to improve her house and support her family. To continue improving her business, her biggest wish is to have a store where she can offer more services. With the given loan, she will buy more inputs (detergent, soap, softeners,) and in this way be able to implement her store better. Adelaida is sitting on the left side and is wearing a black and white sweater. She sends her greetings to Kiva and Edaprospo. She is grateful for the given loan because it allows her to progress.

loans.use: to buy inputs (detergent, soap, softeners).

loans.name: Las Palomas Group

texts.es:
lA ASOCIACION COMUNAL LAS PALOMAS ESTA CONFORMADA POR OCHO INTEGRANTES SEIS MUJERES Y DOS HOMBRE PADRES Y MADRES RESPONSABLES,CON DIES HIJOS BAJO SU RESPONSABILIDAD,SON ORIGINARIAS DEL SAUCE LUGAR QUE ESTA UBICADO EN LA ZONA NORTE DE LA REGION, SE CARACTERIZAN POR SER TRABAJADORAS, RESPONSABLES, CON GANAS DE SUPERACION PERSONAL. EN SUS RATOS LIBRE LE GUSTA DISFRUTAR DE LA COMPANIA DE SUS HIJOS, EN LA ACTUALIDAD, LUCHAN DIA A DIA PARA BRINDARLES UN FUTURO MEJOR.
GRACIAS A SUS GANAS DE SALIR ADELANTE LA CORDINADORA ES LESBIA  Y TIENE POR ACTIVIDAD ECONOMICA LA UNA PULPERIA ES UNA PEQUEÑA TIENDA QUE VENDE PRODUCTOS COMESTIBLES EN CANTIDADES PEQUEÑAS COMO: ARROZ, FRIJOLES, AZUCAR, LECHE, PAN, HUEVOS, JABON, JUGOS, GALLETAS, CREMA, QUESO,HIELOS CAFE, FOSFOROS ETC. ELLA DEDICA A SU NEGOCIO UNAS DOCE HORAS DIARIAS OFRECIENDO SUS PRODUCTOS PARA SASTIFACER LA DEMANDA DE  LOS CLIENTES Y EN FUTURO NO MUY LEJANO PUEDA OBTENER MEJORES INGRESOS. lA ASOCIACION COMUNAL LAS PALOMAS AGRADECE LA AYUDA QUE LOS INVERSIONISTAS KIVA LE BRINDAN A PERSONAS DE ESCASOS RECURSOS Y PAISES POBRE COMO ES NICARAGUA PARA TENER UN MEDIO DE TRABAJO DIGNO.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Las Palomas" has 8 members, of whom 6 are women and two are men. They are fathers and mothers, responsible for ten children between them. They live in El Sauce, a place which is located in the northern part of the region. They are hardworking, responsible and they have goals of personal achievement. In their free time they enjoy spending time with their children, and each day they work very hard to offer their children a better future. 

Because they all have dreams of getting ahead, their leader is Lesbia. She owns a "pulperia", which is a small grocery store. She sells small quantities of edible products such as rice, beans sugar, milk, bread, eggs, ham, juice, cookies, cream, cheese, cold coffees, matches and other products. She works at her store for twelve hours each day, offering those products to satisfy the demands of her customers and to earn a higher income one day soon. 

The Las Palomas communal bank is grateful to the Kiva lenders who offer support to low-income people in poor countries such as Nicaragua, so that they may have a dignified means of work.

loans.use: to stock her grocery store with an assortment of products.

loans.name: Cesaria Rosalia

texts.en:
As a married mother of ten children, Cesaria Rosalia works hard to support her family.

She earns a living by farming bananas in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from charcoal retailing. Cesaria Rosalia is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF in order to buy additional fertilizers and pesticides for her farm.

Cesaria Rosalia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fertilizers and pesticides for her farm.

loans.name: Gulaiym

texts.ru: Гулайым успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве Гулайым на сегодняшний день имеется 3 коров, 15 овец и 5 лошадей. Гулайым обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычка для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Гулайым будет вкладывать в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса и оплату обучения ее дочери.
texts.en:
Gulaiym successfully paid off her previous loan, having used it as intended. She is thankful to Kiva and to everyone who helped her financially.

Gulaiym currently has three cows, 15 sheep and five horses on her farm. She has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 25,000 KGS to purchase a steer for fattening and resale. She will put profits from the loan into further expanding her business and paying for her daughter's education.

loans.use: to buy a steer for fattening and resale

loans.name: Nora

texts.en:
Nora is 60 years old, married, and has seven children, one of whom is in school.

Nora is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Nora requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Nora has been raising pigs for 15 years now, and has borrowed ten times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Nora would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is an active borrower of BRAC Pakistan. She lives with her husband in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband is the guardian of her family. He has been running his own mobile shop for the past seven years.

Nida's husband wants to purchase different types of mobile accessories for his business purpose, but due to insufficient financial means, he is unable to purchase these accessories. Therefore, Nida has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan, she’ll enable her husband to purchase relevant items for his business purpose so that he can earn a more profitable income to manage his business and household.

Nida is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase her husband's mobile phones business.

loans.name: Lourdes Yenniketh

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Vida Nueva  se reúne cada 15 días en el cantón Jaramijo,  este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, aquí la mayoría de los habitantes son muy trabajadores y dedicados a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Lourdes, tiene 45 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tiene tres  hijos de 19, 17 y 14 años  de edad, la menor estudia en colegio y es la que aun vive con ellos. Su marido es guardia de seguridad.
Doña Lourdes es una mujer que le gusta contribuir con los gastos que genera el hogar y la educación de su hija, ella para ganar sus recursos se dedica a la elaboración de dulces, tortas, deditos de carne, empanadillas  y varios bocadillos mas, prepara sus dulces y bocaditos  para clientes particulares que le piden para todos sus compromisos sociales, así como también para la venta al público en general, lleva más de 3 años dedicada a esta labor la misma que le permite ganarse lo suyo. 
Este crédito es para  comprar víveres para preparar sus deliciosos dulces y bocadillos. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son a muy bajos intereses. Sus sueños son darle la mejor educación a su hija.
texts.en:
The lending group, "Vida Nueva" meets every 15 days in the town of Jaramijo. This town is known for its beautiful beaches, where most of the residents are hardworking and dedicated to maritime activities. 

Lourdes lives in Jaramijo. She is 45 years old and lives in a common-law marriage. She has three children, ages 19, 17 and 14. Her youngest daughter is in high school and is the only one that still lives at home. Lourdes's husband is a security guard. Lourdes is a woman who likes to contribute to the household finances and her daughters education. In order to earn an income, she works making sweets, cakes, chicken fingers, empanadas, and other snacks. She makes her sweets and snacks for customers who order them for social events, as well as for public sale. She has three years of experience in this field.

This loan will be used to purchase groceries to make her delicious sweets and snacks. She has been a member of the lending group since its inception, and she enjoys it because of the low interest rates on the loans. Her dream is to provide her daughter with the best education.

loans.use: purchase groceries.

loans.name: Shabnam

texts.en:
Shabnam is a 38-year-old woman, and the mother of two children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband is a vegetable seller by profession; her husband sells vegetables like onions, potatoes, tomatoes, etc. Her husband is the only one responsible for feeding the entire family and managing the household.

Shabnam's husband needs to purchase different types of vegetables for reselling so that her husband can increase the size of the business, improve his sales growth, and earn maximum profit. But due to an unfavorable financial position, her husband is not in a condition to purchase vegetables for his business purpose.

Therefore Shabnam has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that she can help her husband to purchase the above items for the business purpose. She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase her husband's vegetable business.

loans.name: Uzma

texts.en:
UZMA is 32 years old; she is a responsible mother and living happily in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband owns a scrap shop and deals with scrap iron, aluminum, plastic bottles, etc. He has been purchasing scrap goods and sells them to the recycling factories. Nowadays due to household expenses he does not have the amount to buy scrap goods and does not have scrap to sell for money.

Therefore, UZMA has requested a loan for her husband, so that he can buy scrap goods, establish his enterprise, and create some savings to meet sudden needs or incidents. UZMA is very impressed with this honorable support and shows her wish to take more loans after the payment of this loan. UZMA thanks Kiva and their field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy recyclable goods for her husband for reselling to the recycling factories at a high price.

loans.name: Cinthia Roxanna

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Vida Nueva se reúne cada 15 días en el cantón Jaramijo,  este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, aquí la mayoría de los habitantes son muy trabajadores y dedicados a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Cinthia,  tiene 23  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene  un  hijo de 5 meses de nacido a. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca. 
Doña Cinthia es una joven mujer que le gusta ganar sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar, ya que él en ocasiones no gana mucho en sus faenas de pesca y los gastos son cada vez mayores con su bebé, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y semijoyas en muchas variedades, ella sale a vender  puerta a puerta y también en su casa donde tiene unas vitrinas en las cuales exhibe sus productos al público, deja sus artículos a acredito y cobra cada 8 o 15 días dependiendo de sus clientes. Tiene tres años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual puede ganar sus recursos.
Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, blusas, camisas y semi joyas. Tiene tres años en el grupo de crédito, le gusta porque los con  créditos empezó su negocio. Su sueño es darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The lending group "Vida Nueva" meets every 15 days in the town of Jaramijo. This place is know for its beautiful beaches and its hardworking residents who work in maritime activities. 

Cinthia lives in Jaramijo. She is 23 years old, married and has a five-month-old son. Her husband works as a fisherman. Cinthia is a young woman who likes being able to earn an income so that she can help her husband with the household expenses because sometimes he does not earn as much from fishing and their expenses continue to grow with their baby. Cynthia works selling clothing of all types as well as a variety of jewelry. She sells her wares door to door and also in her home where she has display cases to show off her products to the public. She sells her products on credit and she collects her payment every 8 or 15 days, depending on her clients. 

Cinthia has three years of experience working in this field, which has allowed her to earn an income. This loan will be used to purchase pants, blouses, shirts and jewelry. She has been part of the lending group for three years. She enjoys it because she was able to start her business with these loans. Her dream is to give her family the best in life.

loans.use: purchase pants, blouses, shirts and jewelry.

loans.name: Liliana Elizabeth

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Vida Nueva se reúne cada 15 días en el cantón Jaramijo,  este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, aquí la mayoría de los habitantes son muy trabajadores y dedicados a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Liliana, tiene 26 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tiene 1  hijo de 7 meses  de edad. Su marido trabaja en una fábrica local.
Doña Liliana es una mujer que le gusta valerse por sí misma y así generar sus propios ingresos que les ayuden a salir adelante junto a su familia, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende víveres de primera necesidad, granos, embutidos, legumbres, helados, aguas y muchos otros productos para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes que a diario acuden a su local a comprar los víveres para el consumo diario. Gracias a los créditos que ha recibido del grupo ella ha aumentado la variedad de productos razón por lo cual cada vez gana más clientela, lleva más de 6 años con este negocio el cual le permite ganarse algo y estar al tanto de su bebé.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir más su tienda y comprar más variedad de víveres. Lleva 3 ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos ella cada vez aumenta su negocio. Sus sueños es darles lo mejor a  su familia.
texts.en:
The lending group "Vida Nueva" meets every 15 days in the town of Jaramijo. This town is known for its beautiful beaches and its hardworking residents who work in maritime activities.

Liliana lives in Jaramijo. She is 26 years old, lives in a common-law marriage, and has a seven-month-old son. Her husband works in a local factory. Liliana is a woman who likes to stand on her own and earn her own income to help her family get ahead. She has a small grocery store in her home where she sells basic goods, grains, deli meats, beans, ice cream, water, and other goods to meet the needs of her customers who visit her store for their daily needs. 

Thanks to the loans that she has received from this group she has been able to increase the variety of products that she offers since her clientele continues to grow. She has more than six year in this business and it has allowed her to make a living and care for her baby. This loan will be used to stock her store and purchase a greater variety of groceries. She has been with the lending group for three cycle and she has enjoyed it because the loans allow her to expand her business. Her dream is to provide her family with the best in life.

loans.use: purchase groceries.

loans.name: Nubia Josefa

texts.es:
Nubia, de 25 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudió hasta primer año de bachillerato, no continuó sus estudios porque estaba bastante retirado de su casa el Instituto y se le dificultaba llegar porque en esa zona no hay transporte; está acompañada, su pareja es agricultor y han procreado 1 hijo que tiene 2 años de edad.  

Nubia, se dedica a los oficios de hogar, pero tambipen le ayuda a pareja en la agricultura, ambos  se levantan muy temprano para ir al campo a trabajar pues sus cultivos están a una distancia de medio kilómetro, mientras a su pequeño hijo lo dejan con una vecina para que lo cuide.

Nubia, necesita el préstamo para comprar una bolsa de semilla de maíz, 4 sacos de abono, pesticidas y pagar mano de obra para sembrar 16 hectáreas de maíz. 
 
El sueño de Nubia, es obtener buenas ganancias para cancelar a tiempo su préstamo y también darle un mejor futuro a su hijo para que estudie en la universidad.
texts.en:
Nubia is 25 years old, a housewife, and studied until her first year of high school. She did not continue her studies because her house was far away and secluded from the high school, and she had difficulty reaching the area because there is no transportation to it. She is in a relationship, her partner is a farmer and they have one son who is 2 years old.

Nubia does the housework, but also helps her partner in agriculture. They both get up very early to go to the field and work, because their crops are half a kilometer away. Meanwhile they leave their young son with a neighbor to look after him.

Nubia needs this loan to buy a bag of corn seeds, 4 sacks of fertilizer, pesticides, and to pay for the labor to plant 16 hectares of corn.

Nubia's dream is to earn good profits so as to repay her loan on time, and also to give a better future to her child, so he can study at a university.

loans.use: to buy a bag of corn seeds, 4 sacks of fertilizer, pesticides, and to pay for the labor to plant 16 hectares of corn.

loans.name: Shirley Alejandra

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Vida Nueva se reúne cada 15 días en el cantón Jaramijo,  este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas,  aquí la mayoría de los habitantes son muy trabajadores y dedicados a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Shirley,  tiene 30  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene  tres  hijos 11, 8 y 2 años de edad, los dos mayores estudian en escuela. Su esposo es pescador. 
Doña Shirley es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su  forma de venta es puerta a puerta, siempre le gusta vender la mercadería que este de temporada ya que es la que se vende más rápido y mejoran sus ganancias,  trabaja tres días a la semana de dos a tres horas al día. Tiene diez años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual puede ganar sus recursos.
Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, blusas, ropa interior y otras prendas. Tiene tres años en el grupo de crédito, le gusta porque los  créditos son rápidos y de mucha ayuda para ella. Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The "Vida Nueva" lending group meets every 15 days in the town of Jaramijo, a town known for its beautiful beaches and its hardworking residents who work at sea. 

Shirley lives in Jaramijo. She is 30 years old, married and has three children ages 11, 8 and 2. Her two eldest children are in school. Her husband works as a fisherman. Shirley is homemaker who in order to make her own income and help her husband with the household expenses, works selling clothing from door to door. She enjoys selling clothing that is in style since it sells the fastest and boosts her earnings. This loan will be used to purchase pants, blouses, underwear and other clothing items. 

Shirley has been part of the lending group for three years and she enjoys it because the loans are quick and incredibly helpful for her. Her dream is to provide her children with the best in life.

loans.use: purchase pants, blouses, underwear, and other items.

loans.name: Welas

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Meet one of KPP-UMKM’s clients, Welas, who is a 41-year-old married woman with one son and one daughter. Welas is a housewife and her husband has been an employee for four years.

She has asked for a loan of IDR 7,000,000 from KPP-UMKM Syariah. This loan will be used to build a water source at their home to improve access to clean water and sanitation for her family. Her family income is insufficient to build toilets and water sources but Welas will be able to repay the loan received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation and clean water. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank to all lenders.

loans.use: build a water source at their home to improve access to clean water and sanitation for her family.

loans.name: Freddy Orlando

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Vida Nueva se reúne cada 15 días en el cantón Jaramijo,  este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, aquí la mayoría de los habitantes son muy trabajadores y dedicados a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive don Freddy, tiene 51 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos, tres mayores de edad y dos de  15 y 6 años, el menor estudia en escuela. Su mujer es ama de casa.
El señor Freddy es un hombre muy trabajador que realiza cualquier actividad para darles lo mejor a su familia, el se dedica al comercio, vende frutas y legumbres por la localidad, el lleva los productos en una moto taxi que tiene y en el cual vende estos productos, el también  realiza fletes en su moto taxi ya que en este lugar ese es el medio de transporte más utilizado, trabaja todos los días aunque los fines de semanas son los días más buenos y que mejores ganancias le dejan ya que llegan turistas y ellos utilizan este medio para que los lleve de paseo a lugares más alejados de la ciudad,  lleva más de 15 años realizando estas actividades que le permiten salir adelante.
Este crédito lo espera utilizar para realizar ciertos arreglos en su moto taxi y para comprar frutas y legumbres para la venta.  Lleva 4 ciclos en el grupo de crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que recibe del grupo. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The credit group Vida Nueva [New Life] gets together every 15 days in the canton of Jaramijo. This place is known for its beautiful beaches. The majority of the residents here are very hardworking and dedicated to tasks of the sea.

Freddy lives in this place. He is 51 years old and is in a common law relationship from which he has five children, three grown and two ages 15 and 6. The youngest studies in school. His wife is a stay-at-home mom.

Freddy is a hardworking man who carries out any job in order to give his family the best. He works in business. He sells fruit and legumes in his town. He carries the products on a motorcycle taxi that he has and from which he also sells these products. He also carries out transportation services with his motorcycle taxi, since it is the most utilized means of transportation in this place. He works every day, although weekends are the best days and give him the best earnings since tourists arrive and use these means to get to places further from the city. He has carried out these businesses for over 15 years and they allow him to get ahead.

He hopes to use this loan to make some repairs to his motorcycle taxi and to buy fruit and legumes to sell. He has completed four cycles with the credit group and he likes it because of the help he receives from the group. His dream is to give the best to his family.

loans.use: to fix his motorcycle taxi and buy fruit and legumes.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Arlene is 49 years old and has four children who are in school.

Arlene has a buy and sell personal care product business in the Philippines. Arlene requested a 7,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy items to sell like lotion and shampoo.

Arlene has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like lotion and shampoo.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
EL ES UN JOVEN CASADO, SE ENCUENTRA PREOCUPADO POR SU ESPOSA YA QUE SUFRE DE FUERTES DOLORES Y MOLESTIA PARA MASTICAR LOS ALIMENTOS, DEBIDO A QUE PADECE UN PROBLEMA PERIODONTAL POR LO PRESENTA PERDIDA DE HUESO, DE NO RECIBIR ATENCIÓN ESPECIALIZADA PUEDE LLEGAR A PERDER VARIAS PIEZAS DENTALES.
POR EL MOMENTO NO CUENTA CON LOS RECURSOS SUFICIENTES PARA PAGAR EL TRATAMIENTO, YA QUE ÉL ES EL ÚNICO SUSTENTO DE LA FAMILIA.
texts.en:
This young borrower is married, and he is worried about his wife because she suffers from a lot of pain and it hurts her to chew food.  This is due to a periodontal problem that is causing a loss of bone.  If she does not get specialized treatment she may lose some of her teeth.

At this time he lacks the resources to pay for the treatment, and he is the sole support of the family.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es:
El Sr Ruben es de la ciudad de Caaguazú, es mecánico de profesión con años de experiencia en el ramo, de 47 años de edad, tiene esposa y tres hijos que ha sacado adelante por medio de su trabajo y esfuerzo.
Rubén empezó a trabajar desde muy chico en el ramo de mecánica en donde aprendió todo lo que hoy usa en su profesión y de esa manera da un buen servicio a sus clientes.
 Pide este préstamo para poder ampliar y mejorar su taller mecánico, y de esa forma poder seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ruben is from the city of Caaguazu.  He is a mechanic by profession, and he has years of experience in this line of work.  He is 47 years old, and has a wife and 3 children whom he has provided for through his work and efforts.

Ruben started to work as a mechanic from a very young age.  He learned everything that he now uses in his profession, and he provides his customers with good service. 

Ruben is requesting this loan to expand and improve his mechanic's workshop.  This way he can continue to provide his customers with good service.

loans.use: to expand and improve his mechanic's workshop

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza is 44 years old and married with two children. Flordeliza works very hard to provide for them.

Flordeliza runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, junk foods, home product care, and other groceries. Flordeliza has been in this business for ten years and sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soap, and other groceries.

In the future, Flordeliza would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, junk foods, home product care, and other groceries

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Wilma works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from buy and sell dried fish. Wilma is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fishing materials for her fishing business.

Wilma has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials for her business

loans.name: Reina Group

texts.en:
Rena is the featured borrower of Reina group. She got together with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua because they have always been friends since they left their home country of the Philippines to come and work in Lebanon with a better income to support their loved ones back in the Philippines.

Rena is a 44-year-old married mother of one child who is working hard as a housekeeper to cover the expenses and needs of her beloved child and improve his living conditions. Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy land to build her own house in the Philippines. Rena is the lady standing in the middle.

With respect to the other group members, Gerliza is the first lady on the left and Milan is the first lady on the right of the photo.

loans.use: to buy land to build her own house in the Philippines.

loans.name: Mercedes Rosario

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Vida Nueva se reúne cada 15 días en el cantón Jaramijo,  este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, aquí la mayoría de los habitantes son muy trabajadores y dedicados a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive la señora Mercedes, tiene 48 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos, dos mayores de edad y dos de 14  y 12 años, los menores estudian en escuela. Su esposo se dedica a la pesca.
Doña Mercedes es una mujer que le gusta trabajar, ella se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo y su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, sus hijos también le ayudan con las ventas, ellos salen casi todos los días  ofreciendo sus productos, ella también vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes más conocidos, lleva más de 3 años  que se dedica a esta actividad  la cual le permiten ganarse la vida.
Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, camisas, blusas, entre otras prendas. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Vida Nueva communal bank meets every two weeks in Jaramijo canton, a place known for its beautiful beaches. Most residents here are hard workers and their livelihoods are related to the sea.

This is where Mercedes lives. She is 48 years old and married, with four children from this relationship. Two of the children are adults and the other two, ages 14 and 12, are in school. Her husband is a fisherman.

Mercedes is a woman who likes to work. Her business is in sales. She sells all sorts of clothing door to door. Her children also help her with sales. They go out almost every day to offer their products. She also sells out of her house, where her more established customers come to shop. She has been running this business for more than three years, and it allows them to make a living.

This loan is for buying pants, shirts, blouses, and other garments. Mercedes has been part of this communal bank from the start, and she likes it because the loans are helpful. Her dream is to give her children the best.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, blouses, and other garments.

loans.name: Feli Santos

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Vida Nueva se reúne cada 15 días en el cantón Jaramijo,  este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas, aquí la mayoría de los habitantes son muy trabajadores y dedicados a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive el señor Feli, tiene 48 años de edad, está soltero y vive en casa de sus padres, llevas 1 año ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito y le agrada porque gracias a los créditos él puede salir adelante. 
Don Feli es un hombre muy trabajador que le gusta a base de esfuerzo y trabajo salir adelante y ayudar  a sus padres que son de escasos recursos, el se  dedica al comercio,  vende ropa de todo tipo,  sale a vender por la localidad y también el vende en su casa. Gracias a los créditos él pudo empezar esta actividad la cual le permite ganarse la vida y también sacar adelante a sus padres.
Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, camisetas, blusas y otras prendas. Sus sueños es tener un carro para salir a vender.
texts.en:
Vida Nueva communal bank meets every two weeks in Jaramijo canton, a place known for its beautiful beaches. Most area residents are hard workers and their jobs are related to the sea.

This is where Feli lives. He is 48 years old and single and lives in his parents' house. He has been a member of this communal bank for one year and he likes it because the loans allow him to get ahead.

Feli is a hardworking man who likes making the effort to get ahead and help his parents, who have limited finances. He sells all kinds of clothing. He goes out around the area to sell, and he also sells out of his home. Loans enabled him to start this business, which allows him to make a living and also provide for his parents.

This loan is for buying pants, t-shirts, blouses, and other garments. Feli's dream is to have a car for when he goes out to make sales.

loans.use: to buy pants, t-shirts, blouses, and other garments.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Mujeres Unidas 2 está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, luchando para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Cada una de ella está poniendo su mayor esfuerzo para poder mejorar y crecer, entre ellas se destaca la Sra. Fermina, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza, sumado a la cría y venta de gallinas que hace. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, que da a su familia una vida digna y sin privaciones.
La Sra. Fermina solicita de este préstamo para la compra de pollitos  para cría , lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called "Mujeres Unidas 2" is in its second cycle of the committee of women program, in which all work and are taking the challenge to eliminate poverty, struggling to be able to improve their life conditions.

Each one of them is putting in their greatest effort in order to be able to improve and grow. Among them. Fermina stands out. She is improving her impoverished situation thanks to the raising and sales of hens that she does. She is a very hard-working woman who gives her family a worthwhile life without privations.

Fermina is requesting this loan in order to buy chicks to raise which will help her to be able to firm up her business plan which in turn will help her improve her income.

loans.use: to buy chicks to raise and later sell.

loans.name: Las Poderosas Group

texts.es:
Este grupo es de la ciudad de Villa Elisa, las integrantes formaron un grupo unido, donde todas se ayudan las unas a las otras, están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, con el propósito de que cada una sepa sus condiciones de vida, y a través de ello poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
La Sra. Gloria integra este grupo,  es Tesorera del comité, ella se desempeña como vendedora de ropas y también a la venta de comidas rápidas y se describe como una mujer luchadora y capaz para poder salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de ropas para poder seguir con sus ventas y de esa forma poder tener mayor variedad que poder ofrecer a sus clientes. Agradece por la oportunidad que reciben de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
This group is from the city of Villa Elisa. The members form a united group. They all help each other and are in the Poverty Stoplight Program. The aim is for each member to understand their living conditions and through this improve their living conditions.

Gloria belongs to this group. She is the treasurer of the Committee. She works selling clothing and also sells fast food. She describes herself as a fighter and capable of being able to get ahead.

She is requesting this loan to buy clothing to be able to continue with her sales and in this way have greater variety to offer her clients. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is receiving to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Las Poderosas Group

texts.es:
El grupo se formó en la ciudad de Villa Elisa, son 16 mujeres que se esfuerzan por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos. Cada una pone su esfuerzo para poder capacitarse y continuar ayudando a su familia.
Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la Sra. Sonia, quien es la tesorera del grupo, ella además de ser niñera también se esfuerza para poder tener mayores ingresos por medio de la venta de ropas que hace, es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que se esfuerza por poder mejorar cada día, y es por eso que pone todo de si.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar remeras, camisas, pantalones, jeans, y otros tipos de prendas, que le permitirá surtirse y crecer mayor variedad a sus clientes. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder crecer en su emprendimiento.
texts.en:
The group formed in the city of Villa Elisa. They are 16 women who make an effort to improve their life conditions and those of their loved ones. Each one of them puts in an effort to be able to prepare themselves and continue to help their families.

One of the members of this group is Sonia, who is the treasurer of the group. In addition to being a nanny, she makes an effort to have better income through the sales of clothing, which she does. She is a very hard-working and struggling person who works every day to be able to improve. and because of this she puts her whole self into it.

She is requesting this loan to be able to buy T-shirts, shirts, pants, jeans, and other articles of clothing which will allow her to stock up and offer a greater variety to her customers. She is grateful for the opportunity she receives to be able to grow in her entrepreneurship.

loans.use: to buy assorted clothing, such as T-shirts, shirts, pants, jeans, and other types of articles of clothing.

loans.name: Jazmin Poty Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Jazmin Poty está en su ciclo número 6 del programa de comité de mujeres. Está ubicado en la ciudad de Caacupé, las 18 integrantes del comité realizan muchos esfuerzos para así poder salir adelante junto con sus familias. Ellas realizan varias actividades para cumplir con el compromiso asumido y también hacen actividades en conjunto para ayudarse las unas a las otras.
La señora Marina, ayuda al Sostenimiento de su familia con la venta de artículos de mercería y bazar que realiza. Comenta que tiene muchos clientes gracias a la variedad de sus productos, a su amabilidad y a que también tiene buenos precios, ella ha crecido poco a poco gracias a su esfuerzo y sacrificio.
Pide este préstamo para  la compra de artículos para su posterior venta como ser prendas de vestir, artículos para la cocina, como ollas, sartenes, etc. La señora está muy agradecida ya que a través de esta oportunidad puede mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
The group called "Jazmin Poty" is in its sixth loan cycle in the women's committee program. It is located in the city of Caacupé. The 18 members of the committee carry out great efforts in order to get ahead together with their families. They carry out various activities to fulfill the commitment they have taken on, and they also pursue activities together in order to help each other.

Marina helps support her family with her business selling cloth wares and assorted household items. She comments that she has many customers thanks to the variety of products she offers, her friendliness and also her good prices. She has expanded little by little thanks to her effort and sacrifice.

She is requesting this loan to buy items to sell such as clothing, kitchen items such as pots and pans, etc. She is very grateful because through this opportunity she will be able to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell such as clothing, kitchen items such as pots and pans, etc.

loans.name: Ronald Armando

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Vida Nueva se reúne cada 15 días en el cantón Jaramijo,  este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas,  aquí la mayoría de los habitantes son muy trabajadores y dedicados a las faenas del mar.
En este lugar vive el señor Ronald, tiene 19 años de edad, es soltero y vive en casa de sus padres, el estudia biología pesquera en una universidad de la localidad. 
Don Ronald es un joven muy trabajador que le gusta a base de esfuerzo y trabajo salir adelante y así irse forjando un mejor porvenir para cuando le toque forma su familia, el además de dedicarse a sus estudios  también se  dedica al comercio, tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa donde vende con la ayuda de su mamá arroz, azúcar, aceites y muchos otros víveres de primera necesidad, mientras él puede está al tanto de su tienda pero como él tiene que salir a estudiar es su mamá la que siempre le ayuda, lleva tres años dedicado a este negocio para poder pagar sus estudios.
Este crédito es para comprar arroz, azúcar y otros víveres para surtir su negocio y aumentar la variedad de productos.
